story:
Thank you for you support!

Do visit our website (https://www.neoandsons.com) for future purchases!

 

Always find yourself feeling insecure about leaving your expensive lid on your bike? Or do you always bring them along and double it up as a handbag chucking stuff in there ending up scuffing your visor? Our objective is to create not only a functional helmet bag but also one you can be proud to carry around with you when you're out on the streets.

Making use of the dead space within the helmet, the inner pouch allows you to store your essentials while protecting the inner lining of the helmet and your visor from getting damaged yet maintaining a clean minimal form factor.

The Classic is our first product at Neo and Sons. It is built to last a long time and we have spared no effort in making sure of this. This is achieved through the use of time tested materials and processes.

 Giving you the perfect solution to carry your helmet out and about with you.

 

 

 

 

We kept the design simple and sleek. Nothing too loud that shouts for attention on the streets and versatile with any outfits. An understated beauty.

 

 

 

 

 

Please allow for 1-2 cm discrepancies.

 

The idea came about when we saw nothing on the market that meets our expectations in regards to either form or function. Hence we started to design one on of our own. Throughout the creative process, we worked with a target audience to gather practical feedback and have built over 30 prototypes to develop the product to this point. We are really happy with what we have achieved and we hope you will too!

 

 

It has been quite a journey for us. Being a startup in manufacturing soft goods isn’t easy. Profit margins are low and the big part of the challenge is definitely trying to balance affordability with quality. Our focus is to create innovative, simple and functional products that help riders everywhere. With the help of you, we will serve to our community and continue bringing more unique and useful products to share with you!

 

 

 

 

 

Please note: Any and all brands, logos, and/or trademarks displayed on this project are used for demonstration purposes only and are sole property of each respected company and owner. No endorsement or ownership implied.

Profit margins are low and the big part of the challenge is definitely trying to balance affordability with quality. Our focus is to create innovative, simple and functional products that help riders everywhere. With the help of you, we will serve to our community and continue bringing more unique and useful products to share with you!     Please note: Any and all brands, logos, and/or trademarks displayed on this project are used for demonstration purposes only and are sole property of each respected company and owner. No endorsement or ownership implied.

story:
Chalkboard Maps - A new way to map your life. 

 

These maps feature:

  • The latest flexible rubber and iron design so they can roll and move like your lifestyle.
  • A convenient 24x36 inch size for easy framing to match your decor.
  • Accurate geography and beautiful detail to inspire your wanderlust.
  • Textured surface perfect for the artist inside you to make its mark with liquid chalk markers.
  • Magnetic pull to hang your photos and mementos from around the world.
  • Access to our mobile app to turn your favorite digital images into beautiful magnets.
  • Easily erasable and rearrangeable features so you can explore endless new directions.
  • Choose from a World Map, United States Map, or Europe Map

Got asthma? allergies? or just a general disdain for dusting? Then meet your new best friend — liquid chalk. Create vibrant, clear drawings that don’t easily smudge. Then instantly wipe them away with a damp cloth. No mess or cloud of chalk dust involved.

Pair it with liquid chalk markers in your favorite colors. So what will you draw? The possibilities are endless, imagine a few:

  • Color in every state you’ve visited
  • Outline your favorite road trip memories
  • Try your hand at chalk calligraphy
  • Dream up your next big European tour  

Your map easily tailors to reflect your life as you grow and trek in new directions. 

Have a new vacation to plan or memory to journal? 

Then easily wipe away the old and write in the new. The entire world lies at your liquid chalk marker tip, so dream big,


Accurate Geography, Beautiful Detail, Endless Possibility. Minimalist with their classic white-on-black design, Chalkboard Maps complement any decor. 

And at 24x36 inches, they fit perfectly into a variety of easily store-bought frames. So hanging them is a breeze.    

Continent, Country, US and Australian States, Canadian Provinces and Territories Names. Many smaller islands included.

Instantly make your map your own with its amazing magnetic features. Use your unique choice of magnets to show off your best photos and mementos.

What could you display? Well, how about:

  • Bullfighting tickets from Spain
  • Sands collected along the Hawaiian beach
  • Safari park passes from South Africa
  • Elephant magnets from a sanctuary in Thailand
  • Prints of Old Faithful from your shoebox

Great for adults and a blast for kids!

Our Chalkboard Maps turn the world into your children’s art canvas. Create little global citizens who are whizzes at geography. 

Or enjoy some quality bonding time while mapping out your latest family road trip.

Hanging a Chalkboard Map is easy and customizable to your decor and budget.

At 24x36in Chalkboard Maps was made to live in a frame. A high-quality frame will also help your map support all the magnets and photos of your magnificent adventures. 

Just make sure to buy a frame with no glass or remember to remove the glass after purchase so you can personalize away.

Other methods include using a poster hanger or a product like Command Strips.  

Better yet, turn your photos into magnets themselves with Chalkboard Maps’ mobile app. The app allows you to easily upload and custom order magnets of your favorite images. Keep a smile on your face daily with a wall filled with your happiest memories. What Photo Do You Want To Turn Magnetic? 

Ready to map your life, savor your adventures and look forward to your next big experience? Then take advantage now of Chalkboard Map’s Kickstarter exclusive pricing for early mappers.

We’re a team of avid adventurers dedicated to helping you save your travel memories and expand your globetrotting horizons one map at a time. But, we didn’t always fight boring maps and fading memories. Like all superhero origin stories, ours started small—with our CEO couple buying a camper.

Chris and Britni traveled the entire coast of the United States for 10 months. That’s thousands of hours of exploring America’s wonders. Hundreds of breathtaking photos shot. And absolutely zero interesting ways to display them once they got back home.

Sound familiar?

Enter Chalkboard Maps. The infinitely reusable creative outlet for your travel experiences. Karate chop away the layers of dust off your memories with personalized photo magnets. Kapow old maps filled with push pinholes into the trash can. Welcome in the ultimately personalized way to savor your journey.

Join us in the fight against shoeboxing travel souvenirs today.

story:
As many of you already know, my name is Alissa Cook and I am raising support to serve with Christ for India in New Delhi this coming summer.

It is amazing to me how intimate our God is and that He chooses to speak to us on such a personal level. I was praying to be shown where He would like me to serve this coming year and in January I had the pleasure of meeting my new friend Ranjit whose family runs Christ for India. I have known for some time that God desires me to work with children but was still surprised when this opportuinity to work with orphans in New Delhi dropped into my lap.

Christ for India is an organizaiton that works with churches, the poor, widows, and orphans across India. I will be using my gifts as a counselor to minister to the orphans there and feel truly blessed for this opportunity.

The trip will be from July 31st to August 15th and will cost $2,500 with deposits due regularly. The money will go towards transportation, room, and board. Anything that I earn extra will go directly to the ministry.

Please pray for my team as we go and that God would guide us and keep our hearts open to His leading. Please also pray that God would keep me physically well and for the individuals we will be ministering to.

I am truly thankful for whatever support you are able to provide, whether that be financially or in prayer. Both will be essential.

Our book is still available!

Südbahnmuseum/MürzzuschlagJune until October 2015- exact dates will be updated soon

The SÜDBAHNHOTEL - the authentic "Grand Budapest Hotel"

Help us create an outstanding art book about a historically important monument, the largest former palace hotel in Central Europe. The Südbahnhotel, Magic Mountain of the Viennese, abandoned since fifty years and in danger to disappear forever.

This is our book cover  (design by Elisabeth Kopf)


About me

My name is Yvonne Oswald, I am a photographer based in Vienna Austria. Over the last years I have published six successful books on different topics, and my editorial work features in international magazines like Architectural Digest, Elle Decor, Christie's Magazine, The World of Interiors and Coté Est among others. My pictures are exhibited in galleries and art-shows and are part of collections all over Europe.


The Südbahnhotel - the Project

The Südbahnhotel (or Southern Railway Hotel) up at the Semmering mountains south of Vienna, is one of the last untouched examples of a palace hotel and stands as a symbol for the history of the Viennese and Central European society of the late 19th and early 20th century.

My photographic project started in 2009. I wanted to delve into what remained of the sophisticated life? Would one still be able to sense the atmosphere of this exceptional time? Or only the melancholia of a dying palace hotel? What remained of the elegant facade, the passion and creativity of this complex society? And is the tragedy of the sudden brutal end of this era still lingering in these rooms?

Over countless visits I tried to capture the spirit of intellectuals and artists like Stefan Zweig, Arthur Schnitzler, Sigmund Freud, Gustav Mahler, Hugo von Hofmannsthal, Ludwig Wittgenstein, Franz Werfel or Karl Kraus, just to name a few. All of them had an intimate and long lasting relationship with the hotel and the region. (Stefan Zweigs famous novel “Burning Secret” for example, takes place at the Suedbahnhotel and his novels were also inspiration for Wes Anderson's  film The Grand Budapest Hotel)

Magic Mountain # 12 "untitled"; Bel Etage, room 111

The Area

The Semmering area became fashionable in the late 1870's with the construction of the southern bound railway "Südbahn" from Vienna to Trieste. The Südbahnhotel opened in 1882 as an alpine luxury hotel. From the very beginning, the hotel as well as the whole region, thrived under the allure of Austria’s imperial family, the Habsburgs. The financially potent bourgeoisie soon followed, as did intellectuals and artists and the area became the hotspot of the Fin de Siècle society. The hotel was constantly expanded until 1913. In it's prime it was one of the largest palace hotels in  Europe with over 350 rooms and all the luxury and conveniences of the period.

Its decline was caused by Austria's annexation by the Nazis in 1938. Jewish citizens were banned from all hotels and their Villas were confiscated.

After WW2 the Suedbahnhotel was reopened, but could never regain its former significance. The spirit was gone and a deep melancholia took its place. In the late 1960's it was finally closed and stands empty since then.

Most other grand buildings in this alpine region have either been destroyed or renovated beyond recognition. So the Südbahnhotel stands as the only remaining symbol of a sophisticated and artistically inspiring era: truly the Magic Mountain of the Viennese.

Magic Mountain # 7 "Winterstorm"; terrace in front of Waldhofsaal

The book

The photos for the book are all ready. We plan a hardcover book 26x28 cm (10,2x11 in) with 180 pages featuring about 220 of my photos in high quality printing as well as essays by the philosopher Elisabeth von Samsonow and two other authors to the content of the book.

Metro Verlag/Vienna will bring out my book with an edition of 2000 copies in German and English. Elisabeth Kopf, award winning bookdesigner, will bring the pages to life. If we are fortunate enough to receive sufficient funding, we plan a supporting video. Furthermore three exhibitions about my project are in planning for 2014 and 2015 .

Many books have been written about the Semmering region, its visitors and architecture, with photography always only in a supporting role. My project will be the first one telling the story through the pictures alone.


Why donate?

High quality books of this kind are expensive to produce and the printing costs will make out the biggest part (about € 11.000). We also have to cover the costs for graphic design, text, translation, proofing and shipping. I have settled all my travels and other expenses over the years myself. Your support will ensure that this book is printed to the highest possible standards. The actual costs for my book have been calculated with € 21.500. We have received a small funding by the Austrian and County government, but there are still a lot of expenses to cover.

This is why I am reaching out to the Indiegogo community.

I want this photo book to stand as a poetic memorial of a historically important monument of the Central European Fin de Siècle society.

Thank you for your consideration and support!

Additional ways you can help
Beside the funding you can help us so much by spreading my campaign through mail, facebook or twitter or just simply talk about it. For more information about my work please visit my website
www.yvonneoswald.at

Thank you!

Magic Mountain # 4 "untitled"; 2nd floor room 206


Magic Mountain # 5 "Waldhofsaal"; Café and ballroom

Magic Mountain # 3 "untitled"; hotel lobby


Magic Mountain # 1 "All gone" 2nd floor, room 210


Magic Mountain # 2 "Bel Etage"; corridor 1st floor


Magic Mountain # 9 "untitled"; green dining hall


Magic Mountain #14 "Alpinbad"; swimming pool built in 1920 in Art Deco style

Magic Mountain # 10 "untitled" ; 1st floor, suite 115

Magic Mountain # 15 "Grand ballroom"

 Gloggnitz 1992, Wien 1992

story:
Fitness is hard work! Getting the right nutritional supplements into your body is a crucial step.


Available in four awesome colors!



Convenient carrying clip


Made beyond powerful, it conquers the toughest of supplements.


Looking for other ways to use the TITAN Mixer Bottle to compliment your lifestyle? The specially designed TITAN Auger Blade can mix a variety of recipes.



Risks and challenges

We’re so passionate about this project, that we’re committed to doing everything in our power to solve any challenges that may arise along the way – that’s a promise!

There are many hurdles to overcome when bringing a new innovative product to market. At 5ID, we have taken every step possible, from product design through to manufacturing, to deliver a superior product without compromise.

story:
VacuumClicka is an ultra portable vacuum gadget. It is small, easy to use, affordable, and can be used on any bag.

Step 1 - Separate 'em!

Separate the upper and lower clicka valve.

Step 2 - Place lower Clicka inside the bag

Place the lower clicka valve (the one with sharp point) inside the bag, about 1 inch away from the stored products. Then place the bag on a flat surface.

Step 3 - Click 'em!

Place the upper clicka valve on the outside of the bag, position above the lower valve. Flatten the bag with your hands to eliminate wrinkle. Press in the middle of the upper clicka valve until it's "clicked".

Step 4 - Seal it closed!

Open up the clip and place the bag slightly above the clicka valves. Simply seal it closed and make sure the whole bag is inside the clip.

Step 5 - Pump it!

Place the pump on the upper clicka valve and pump it until the bag is fully vacuumed. That's it!

You can use the VacuumClicka on most pre-packaged bags that you see from the grocery stores! Making it easy and simple to keep your favorite snacks fresh!

With the VacuumClicka, you no longer need to break the bank with expensive vacuum machines. 

The VacuumClickas are reusable. Use it as many times as you want!

Once you're done, simply put them back in your kitchen drawer and use them again next time. Save your precious counter space!

Whether you're camping, travelling, or going for a hike, you can always pack the VacuumClicka with you to keep your favorite snack fresh.

Store your frozen meat or seafood in the freezer to keep them fresh longer. 

Simply put them in the dishwasher when you need to clean them. 

Put your frozen meat in the microwave to defrost!

Whether it's fruits, meat or seafood. You can now keep your food fresh longer!

Say no more to freezer burn!

Vacuum seal your food to preserve the natural flavors.

In a hurry to marinate your food? Use it to make the marinating process faster for your next BBQ!

Use it to prepare your meals for the week!  

You can also use it to save space when packing clothes. Especially useful while travelling or camping to save space and keep your clothes dry!

VacuumClicka Starter Kit (Clicka x 3 / Clip x 3 / Pump x 1 / Bag x 3)

VacuumClicka Refill Kit (Clicka x 3 / Clip x 3 / Bag x 3)

ClickaBag Refill Kit (Bag x 20)

We will ship from our fulfillment facility in Vancouver, Canada to anywhere around the world. 

Thanks for taking the time to check us out! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.

If you have any questions at all, please feel free to get in touch with us!

Backers: info@vacuumclicka.com

Business Enquiries: business@vacuumclicka.com

Press & Media Enquiries: Colin Trethewey - colin@prmedianow.com

After our campaign is finished, we will be sending out a backer survey. This is where you will be able to select add-on items to your perks. You can choose as many add-ons as you want!Here's the list of add-ons that you will see from the survey. You don't have to pledge for them at the moment. Simply select the perks that you want from our option, then wait for the backer survey to add-on the items you wish.

We will ship from our fulfillment facility in Vancouver, Canada to anywhere around the world. We ship worldwide!
Can the VacuumClicka really be used on any bags?While it can be used on any bags, the sealed period will highly depend on the thickness of the bags you use. We recommend using bags that are at least 5mil in thickness as the Clicka needs to have enough grip on the bags to retain the vacuum seal. The good news is, most of the pre-packaged bags out of the shelves are already thick enough to be used!Is the VacuumClicka reusable?Yes, The VacuumClicka is reusable and dishwasher safe! You can reuse them over and over again!Can we use the VacuumClicka for Sou-Vide cooking?Absolutely! Our Clicka has been tested and safe for sou-vide cooking for up to 100ºC. However, we recommend using an external heat sealer to seal tight the bags.How long is the Clip?Our clips are 10" in length and will be able to seal most pre-packaged bags.Can we add-on additional items?Absolutely. After our campaign is finished, we will be sending out a backer survey. This is where you will be able to select add-on items to your perks. You can choose as many add-ons as you want!Thanks for taking the time to check us out! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.If you have any questions at all, please feel free to get in touch with us!Backers: info@vacuumclicka.comBusiness Enquiries: business@vacuumclicka.comPress & Media Enquiries: Colin Trethewey - colin@prmedianow.comPlease share our project on Facebook and Twitter to let your friends and family know how awesome this project is!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Denny Barker and I am a long time inventor.  I've always been the type of person to see how every situation could be cured with the right product or invention.  That's how Brady Packs came to be! The special needs of a dear friend  battling pancreatic cancer. Brady has always been the kind of young man that lives life to the fullest.  And during an exhausting overnight bicycling trip in the hills of Cranberry Back Country, his father and I learned that the hard way! 

 Rounds of chemo had broken everything but his young spirit. Brady could barely manage to get himself, let alone fifty pounds of gear, into the deep country mountains. It quickly became evident that his father and I would need to carry his load...  but we didn't have enough arms!

We shoved tents down shirts and carried bags in our mouths! For him to truly live life to the fullest we needed a helping hand. So that was the night Brady Packs were born!

VERY SAD UPDATE.  Soon after this campaign went up Brady's health turned for the worst.  On Monday December 14th, 2015 Brady Powers Mickey passed away.  We were expecting that someday he would not be here, we just didn't think it would be so fast.  We took a couple of weeks to honor Brady and his wonderful family and now we will go even harder to honor his memory and legacy.  Any contributions coming into Brady Packs that do not buy a product will go to Brady Powers SAS.  The SAS stands for School of Apprentice Studies.  We will miss you Brady.

What We Need & What You Get

Brady Packs has a very unique advantage over most of the crowdfunding campaigns out there.  Brady Packs is part of a industrial and a commercial cooperative called Together Jobs.  Together Jobs is designed to create many jobs in this country.  The following video will help explain Together Jobs  https://youtu.be/VnR2y_9Fqmg. 

The other advantage that exist with Brady Packs is that all of our products have been designed, built and tested.  All processes in manufacturing, training, inventories and shipping has been developed.  Sufficient inventories for manufacturing has already been obtained.  As stated earlier, Brady Packs is part of a cooperative.  This means that a membership is required in order to buy our products or work for us.  There is a specific reason for that and the following video helps explain that and how easy that membership is obtained.   Break it down for folks in more detail:https://youtu.be/Rw3OQPwzqbo. 

The more you find out about Brady Packs and Together Jobs and the other companies that will soon follow, you will realize how all of this is more than just products, it's  movement.  A movement that will transform rural America and our nation into more of a manufacturing nation instead of mostly a import nation.

Brady Packs also wants to be very clear about what happens if we don't receive the minimum amount or even in the case if we would receive much more than the minimum.  All funds, no matter how much, will go to making and shipping the orders. 

     

The Impact

My Board of Advisors and I have spent several years developing abroad range of products beginning with Brady Packs that will help bring manufacturing jobs back to this country as well as great products at or lower than those for imported goods.  You have only seen the basics of Brady Packs This product line is endless and it all came about because of one very sick young man.  Through your support his family will get very needed help and Brady wil never be forgotten.

Risks & Challenges

We at Brady Packs and Together Jobs believe very strongly in crowfunding, especially Indiegogo.  All of this actually started 10 years ago right after hurricane Katrina.  Over that period many business strategies were researched to start a company that could not only be successful but would become an entity that would bring about positive enhancements to this great nation and its people. 

There is always risk in any venture, especially one of these magnitudes.  We feel that as much of that risk as possible was addressed by the fact that all testing and processes were completed beforehand and manufacturing space ready. More than enough resources are either in house or available to handle orders.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • I really hope you read this part.  The only way all of this was put together is because we as group finally made a decision to look objectively without bias at this nation.  We started at the turn of the 20th century to today.  Where this nation was then and where it is now and how we got here.  We did it without blame or personal interest.  From that point we sit down and rationalized and even dreamed of where we want this nation to be.  At that point came the most rewarding part of our expedition.  When each person finally decided to look at the options without blame or personal bias a path was started.  It took a long time but we believe that this is the best jobs plan out there and the great thing is we don’t have to change anything to do it.  We don’t have to lobby Congress or get the President behind us.  We don’t have to change the education system or rob other good employers of their employees.  We don’t have to sell shares or borrow money. 

    Sounds impossible, its not.  We just need members to be part of this movement.  Not like most cooperatives where you have to pay every year and for that you get a card and the right to buy there.  With us you get a beautiful product that actually someone has to make and its good forever.  No matter how rich you are you can’t buy more than one membership per person and can’t get more out of it than any other person.  Believe me when I say that we are inclusive not exclusive.  We will be starting a program soon that if you can’t afford a membership, arrangements will be made. 

    Here is how each of you can help.  Yes buying our products are important and buying our memberships are important.  Also the $10 that you give will do more than you can ever imagine but it is also very important that you spread the word.  Talk about it and share it with friends.  Businesses out there buy a membership and we will make the board so you can put it on your wall.  There is nothing that will help your business than more local people working in good paying jobs and off social programs.  This will spread to every state in just a few months.

    Thanks again Denny Barker.

story:
Using durable high-grade silicone, we’ve created a minimalistic water bottle that rolls up and stores into a quarter of its actual size – not to mention the sturdy paracord and firestarter that make the MWB a complete survival tool.





We've used a lot of different water bottles, and the design and functions of each create a unique experience. While keeping away from some designs, others inspired us (like the Platypus hydration pack, Bubi, and S'well). We wanted to create a bottle that stood for nothing more than the essentials in its design, and we feel we've done just that. The bottle's durable body bends and fits pretty much anywhere while the rugged firestarter gets the flame going. The 8ft of strong paracord let the MWB meet all your nature needs. 





We saw a gap in water bottles while searching for the right one. We can’t stand not having water around... I’m sure you feel the same, you little fish you. We didn’t like the bulky plastic water bottles because, well, they were too darn bulky and in the way, plus they'd crack if they had a good tumble. We didn’t like the metals because they make so much noise when in contact with keys or zippers from your bag, plus they stay dented forever. We did not like the water bladder bags because handling them with water feels odd and unstable… Finally, we didn't like that the water bottle was only about water; why not add something more? We were just unsatisfied with what was available. So, we took to the white boards and came to the MWB. 





We travel a lot and are outdoors at every chance we get. Packing for such things should be an easy task, but often can turn into a complicated and indecisive one. We feel things now-a-days are made too complicated and/or with too many pieces to complete them. We love to see things made thoughtfully and tactfully.  



While designing the MWB, we wanted a feature piece that would make our bottle distinguishable from anything out there. So, we put our efforts into the attachment piece. We wanted it to compliment the person holding the bottle, its environment, and of course the bottle itself. We have three Words for you: Paracord & Flint (Yes were considering the ampersand a word… debatable indeed!). All together creating the most foundational elements known and needed for humans everywhere; water and fire. 


A Steel Ribbed Ring Made & Designed To Scrape Your Tinder & Flint For Easy Flames. 




LETS TALK WASTE: In the U.S alone, more than 60 million plastic bottles end up in landfills and incinerators every day. Just last year, plastic bottles total'd to 22 billion!And even though a lot of us do our very best by standing in front of the waste units deciding on what darn color and shape of hole correlates to recycling (yeah it gets confusing), it’s still not enough. At least 80% of these plastics end up in our landfills, streets, parks and beaches.  

We can help decrease this number considerably. We have created a useful and handy water bottle better than anything out there that empowers you to go anywhere and do anything. So please join us in making our goal a reality. Lets try changing this for the better.



Click the image above to check out the Minimal Tool Card (MTC)


We want to thank you for checking out our campaign, and hope you consider supporting our project! If you do support, your funds will go toward producing the MWB, distributing it around the world, and creating a Minimal Design Company community. We want your feedback so that we can collaboratively create projects that will make life a little easier without using too much material. 



Risks and challenges

We’re extremely passionate about the MWB and we’re committed to doing everything in our power to solve any challenges that may arise along the way – that’s a promise!

We have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet our promised deadlines. We have our manufacturing and operations all ready to go, and we've made sure to leave enough time so that all of your MWB's will arrive as planned. We are confident that our calculated plan will work effectively once we're funded, and that we'll be putting the MWB in your hands for all your everyday tasks -- and more -- by December!

story:
What It's All About

We are three german hikers who want to walk a coast-to-coast traverse of Iceland. While there have been several cross-country hikes, we're trying to do it on a new route. We'll publish detailed information about how to tackle an Iceland traverse when we will have returned, thus creating an opportunity for everybody to repeat it. Additionally, you will be able to experience the harshness of Iceland, watching our trip-video at home with a steaming mug of tea.

Who we are

  • Thorsten, our expert in ultralight equipment. He got some experience in hiking and mountaineering and recently got into long distance trekking.
  • Ben is a climber, skier and the current leader in the german adventure race series 2013 (challenger - mixed).
  • David is our language professional and has made several hiking trips around europe. He also was the brain behind our perks, so check them out!

What We Need

We set the funding at 500$ which we need to cover transport in Iceland, lodging for the first and the last night in Iceland and for all the food we're going to take with us. With 500$ we have neither gear, nor flights covered, so every additional cent is a big deal for us!

Transport: 210$ (Bus transport is expensive in Iceland)

Lodging: 60$ (10$ a night is the least you can get in Reykjavik)

Food: 230$ (We're going to take almost 50kg/100pounds of food with us, which we will buy in Germany and prepare ourselves)

What You Get

If our campaign receives more than 500$, we offer 2 specials:

If the funding reaches $750, we'll jump into the sea at the start AND the end of our tour.

If the funding reaches $1000, every contributer will be asked to send us his estimation of how long the tour is going to take us. The closest bet will win a hiking trip (for more information see the corresponding perk).

The Impact

Iceland is and has always been a magnet for hikers because of its overwhelming beauty and uniqueness. Altough there are some established hiking routes, the biggest part of the island isn't covered with markers. If you support us, we'll publish enough information for you to repeat this tour and experience the remote parts of Iceland. Additionally, you will be able to watch our trip movie.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know what it's like to be on a tight budget, so if you don't have the money to support us...

  • ...spread the word, that some guys wanna realize a cool project
  • ...let us sleep at your appartment in or around Reykjavik before or at the end of our trip, so we can save the money for hostels. Story telling included for sure!
  • ...sponsor us gear - we still need some stuff and would publish a review in return. Contact via email.

For further information...

...equipment reviews or travel reports, visit our Outdoor-blog at www.wegelagern.wordpress.com

The articles are mostly written in German, however, a few have an English translation.

Additionally, you will be able to experience the harshness of Iceland, watching our trip-video at home with a steaming mug of tea.
Who we are

Thorsten, our expert in ultralight equipment. He got some experience in hiking and mountaineering and recently got into long distance trekking.
Ben is a climber, skier and the current leader in the german adventure race series 2013 (challenger - mixed).
David is our language professional and has made several hiking trips around europe. He also was the brain behind our perks, so check them out!

What We Need
We set the funding at 500$ which we need to cover transport in Iceland, lodging for the first and the last night in Iceland and for all the food we're going to take with us. With 500$ we have neither gear, nor flights covered, so every additional cent is a big deal for us!
Transport: 210$ (Bus transport is expensive in Iceland)
Lodging: 60$ (10$ a night is the least you can get in Reykjavik)
Food: 230$ (We're going to take almost 50kg/100pounds of food with us, which we will buy in Germany and prepare ourselves)
What You Get
If our campaign receives more than 500$, we offer 2 specials:

If the funding reaches $750, we'll jump into the sea at the start AND the end of our tour.
If the funding reaches $1000, every contributer will be asked to send us his estimation of how long the tour is going to take us. The closest bet will win a hiking trip (for more information see the corresponding perk).


The Impact
Iceland is and has always been a magnet for hikers because of its overwhelming beauty and uniqueness. Altough there are some established hiking routes, the biggest part of the island isn't covered with markers. If you support us, we'll publish enough information for you to repeat this tour and experience the remote parts of Iceland. Additionally, you will be able to watch our trip movie.

Other Ways You Can Help
We know what it's like to be on a tight budget, so if you don't have the money to support us...

...spread the word, that some guys wanna realize a cool project
...let us sleep at your appartment in or around Reykjavik before or at the end of our trip, so we can save the money for hostels. Story telling included for sure!
...sponsor us gear - we still need some stuff and would publish a review in return. Contact via email.

For further information...
...equipment reviews or travel reports, visit our Outdoor-blog at www.wegelagern.wordpress.com
The articles are mostly written in German, however, a few have an English translation.

story:
12/6/14 Update: We did it! Thanks to you and generous donation from Concept Systems we met the Withnell Motor Co $5k matching challenge! Thank you, Withnell Motor Co and all the kind contributors that put community first! Which area business will step up next? 

11/20/14 Update: Big news from Withnell Motor Company! Beginning today, Withnell Motor Company will match donations, dollar-for-dollar, up to $5,000. If you were waiting to donate, now is the time!! Thank you, David Withnell and the Withnell Motor Company family!!


 

   

           

The Salem Area Trail Alliance (SATA) is a grassroots organization that seeks to design, build and maintain nearby non-motorized trails for health enhancing recreational opportunities while preserving and improving our local green spaces. We are a Chapter of the International Mountain Bike Association (IMBA) with 501(c)3 non-profit designation. Your donation is tax deductible (Federal Tax ID #: 27-3185043)!

One of our most ambitious and exciting projects has been the development of a trail facility and bike park in Salem, Oregon nestled in at the north end of Wallace Marine Park.  We've been working through the planning phase with the City of Salem for the past three years and its time to move forward.

Our vision for the facility is to design a space that everyone can enjoy, a recreational hub for kids and the young at heart, a safe place for families - a playground for all of Salem!

In 2012, we held two design workshops and asked you what you wanted out of this facility. Thanks to a technical assistance grant from the National Parks Rivers, Trails and Conservation Assistance Program and a generous in-kind donation from Sector Environmental Design, the concept map you see below was developed. The facility will include ~2 miles of cross-country trails (single-track) and two pump tracks - one track will be dedicated to young children and beginners, the other will challenge more advance riders. The cross-country trails will integrate 8-10 bicycle trail features throughout.

Larger view

What We Need 

Everything is falling into place to make this vision a reality. SATA will work with the City of Salem to hire a professional design and construction firm to conduct most of the heavy lifting. The chosen firm will work closely with SATA, the City of Salem and most importantly - you! Estimates for the facility, including design fees, have ranged from $90k-120k.

*Costs will increase by 25% with hardened surfaces.

This facility will be funded 100% by private donations and grants. Hiring a design and build firm is expensive but necessary to ensure a high quality facility. 

I am a runner/walker. What's in it for me?

Beautiful, connected, safer, and, in some sections, separated trails! The increased positive use of the area will improve user safety and visibility. One of our first tasks will be to clear out the invasive vegetation to create improved site lines and visibility for all users. Separated trail "off shoots" will be constructed in sections of the facility where bikers want to gain speed - reducing runner/biker conflicts.

What happens if SATA doesn't reach its goal?

This crowdfunding initiative is only one component of the overall fundraising campaign. SATA will be applying for grants, which often require a cash match, holding fundraiser events and working closely with potential business donors. If we don't reach our goal via this crowdfunding campaign, we'll use the money we do raise to start the design process. Below is a quick breakdown of the components of the facility and associated costs. If, for example, we raise $50k we'll use the funds for design, the cross country trails and the "tot track." Other components will be phased in and we'll rely more on volunteer assistance. Please note: Funds you donate on this page will not be credited back to you if we don't reach our goal. However, any funds raised here will be used for the Wallace facility only.

Why Are You Hiring a Professional Firm?

Volunteers do amazing work but at the end of the day Salem needs a facility that is safe, enjoyable and sustainable! We’ve discussed the project with several trail organizations in the northwest that utilized volunteers to build similar facilities. They all stated that they wished they had brought in the pros. Professional designers and builders are just that - professional! They do these types of projects everyday. One key element of the design/build process is to engage volunteers along the way. When discussing the project with professional firms, SATA has expressed its desire to ensure volunteers are integrated into the entire process - design to build. Construction timelines include several workdays where volunteers will work alongside the chosen firm. We need your passion and energy to get this facility built and keep it maintained into the future. Below are some design renderings, similar to what will be produced through the design process, from similar projects. We would like to thank IMBA for sharing these!

What's a Trail Feature?

Here are some examples of trail features that will be integrated throughout the trail facility. These would be directional (one-way) off shoots from the main cross country trail. Thanks to Progressive Bike Ramps for sharing.

Why Wallace Marine?

SATA brought the idea to the City of Salem in 2011. We discussed the facility and its goals with City officials. For various reasons Wallace Marine Park was chosen as an ideal location:

  1. Long history of biking, running and walking in the park;
  2. Proximity to downtown;
  3. Access via the Union St Bridge;
  4. Pre-existing trails and other infrastructure (i.e., parking lot, restrooms, water)
  5. The desire for positive use in a neglected section of the park; and,
  6. Proximity to the softball complex.

The Impact

This project, when complete, will help to make Salem more livable for its current residents and prospective ones. Amenities like this facility have the potential to drive our community socially and economically. One of the reasons we're starting with Wallace (yes we want to build more!) is that this facility will compliment the nationally recognized softball complex. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      SATA holds trail work parties throughout the region. We understand if you can't donate funds at this time. We hope this facility and our other projects at Spring Valley and Silver Falls will inspire you to come out and dig with us. We need your energy for this project and many others we are working on!


      Let's make Salem awesome!

Here are some examples of trail features that will be integrated throughout the trail facility. These would be directional (one-way) off shoots from the main cross country trail. Thanks to Progressive Bike Ramps for sharing.

SATA brought the idea to the City of Salem in 2011. We discussed the facility and its goals with City officials. For various reasons Wallace Marine Park was chosen as an ideal location:

Proximity to downtown;


Access via the Union St Bridge;


Pre-existing trails and other infrastructure (i.e., parking lot, restrooms, water)


The desire for positive use in a neglected section of the park; and,

Proximity to the softball complex.

The Impact

 This project, when complete, will help to make Salem more livable for its current residents and prospective ones. Amenities like this facility have the potential to drive our community socially and economically. One of the reasons we're starting with Wallace (yes we want to build more!) is that this facility will compliment the nationally recognized softball complex. 



  Other Ways You Can Help SATA holds trail work parties throughout the region. We understand if you can't donate funds at this time. We hope this facility and our other projects at Spring Valley and Silver Falls will inspire you to come out and dig with us. We need your energy for this project and many others we are working on!




Let's make Salem awesome!

story:
BISON GEARS Kiridashi Pocket Knife 

 BISON GEARS Kiridashi Pocket Knife was inspired by Japanese Kiridashi Knife in order to build a beautiful aesthetic pocket knife. BISON Kiridashi knife is 5 mm (0.20 in) thickness and made by 8CR13MOV stainless steel, 0.15 oz, and just 35 mm (1.38 in) and 60 mm (2.46 in). It is a single bevel knife with finger ring to hold on your hands. The SAYA (Case) holds and pivots BISON Kiridashi Knife.   Five different color options of SAYA, Summer Orange, Baby Blue, Cool Black, Snow White and Military Green. 

Promotional Gift

SAYA Color Option

Spec

Thank you!!

www.bisongears.com

story:
Welcome to our project! We’re brothers Brian & Dan… and we're making the World's Best Icepack for Beverages. We call it YAKET ICE... the only ice you'll need for your cooler!

Regular ice can be great for cooling... but you need to fill up your cooler up for it to be most effective and it often ends up a melted soggy mess. Ice packs are a great concept... they offer great convenience but most are generally ineffective at really cooling beverages when compared to ice. Some of them even market themselves as ‘chillers’. Would you rather have a ‘chilled’ beverage or an ‘ice cold beverage’?  

We believe we've designed the world's best beverage ice pack… better than a typical ice pack and even better than ice in many ways. Read on for the details... 

While YAKET ICE is a very unique product, it’s fundamentally still an ICE PACK with all of the inherent benefits… leave one (or two or three) in your freezer and it’s grab and go when you need it. It won’t ‘melt’ and make a pool in your cooler. Go ahead and add snacks, sandwiches, etc. to your cooler without worrying about drowning them.  

The pack is much larger than a typical scalloped beverage ice pack… weighing in at just over 3 lbs. The reasoning is simple, a bigger pack has much more cooling capability to get your drinks colder, faster… and keep them colder, longer.

Shape-wise the pack is longer and wider, but we’ve also made the pack taller than typical scalloped packs to better match beverage sizes. Overall, it's 9.9" X 3.25" X 5". While the pack is ‘larger’, it still fits in many ‘small’ sized coolers.  When using with cans, you can even stack them if that works best for your cooler size.

Colder

We use the best/coldest cooling fluid. Our pack freezes at 5F (-15C)... most packs freeze at 32F (0C). The 5F (-15C) cooling gel is much more expensive... but we're out to make it the best pack, not the cheapest pack. 

Innovative

We’ve designed a compression ICE BAND to assure your pack and beverage always remain in contact.  The band is held securely in place by grooved features on the pack ends.

The ICE BAND is key to promoting maximum heat flow between the beverage and pack through conduction. We have a patent pending on our innovative pack design.

Lastly, we designed standoffs on the bottom of the pack to limit how much of the pack touches the bottom of the cooler. We're all about maximizing YAKET ICE's ability to make your beverage cold. 

Performance

Cooling Capability

There are many factors that come into play when reviewing pack performance.  Beverage type, beverage size, beverage starting temperature, cooler type, cooler size, ambient temperature, how frequently the cooler is opened and closed... to name a few. 

We've optimized YAKET ICE for 'outings' use... think tailgating, a day at the beach, a BYO cookout, etc.  As such, we want the pack to get beverages super cold as fast as possible... and keep them very cold for at least 12 hours... with no extra ice required.

We're not testing in best-case scenarios. To highlight the cooling capability, the testing below was done on 16oz water bottles... these are 33% larger than your typical 12oz beverage.

Again, we're not testing in best-case scenarios. All testing was performed in medium sized, inexpensive consumer grade coolers (think Coleman/Igloo not YETI). The better your cooler, the better your long term cold keeping performance will be.

Durability

The packs are constructed to last years and years.  Again, we're trying to make it the best... not the cheapest.  

  • The cooling gel (non-toxic) does not lose it's cooling effectiveness over time.  
  • The housing is durable HDPE plastic (recyclable) molded extra thick to handle the 3lb+ pack weight and to keep it's shape over time.
  • The seal point is a special small diameter 'over cap'... which we believe to be more durable and long lasting versus a typical larger  'plug-style' seal.
  • We've thermally stressed the packs by taking them straight out of the freezer onto a 100+ degree deck... and repeated. No issues.
  • We've physically stressed them... packs have been drop tested 24 times from 3 feet onto concrete. No issues.
  • The ICE band is molded from high tear strength silicone.  It's not a flimsy part, these will last years and years.  I've tried to 'snap' one by over stretching and I can't do it!  No issues.

We've designed/configured a premium, long lasting product. The reality is that when you manufacture products in higher quantities, some things can go wrong occasionally.  We're all about making a quality product and providing exceptional customer service.  If you experience a product issue, we're here to take care of it (we've been in business over 10 years now).

Super Cold Considerations

  • Due to the pack size/weight and the -15C/5F freeze point, it takes about 36hrs. to freeze a room temperature pack in a normal freezer (most consumer freezers are set at -18C/0F or lower).  If you intend to use YAKET ICE daily... pledge for two or more:)
  • Can my drink get too cold?  Depending on factors, it's possible to freeze or partially freeze drinks. We've partially frozen 12oz bottled waters.  Most beers and sodas are carbonated and under pressure... both of which lower the freeze point to ~28F.  YAKET ICE will get them there!  We've not frozen an unopened beer or soda outright, but we've iced up a few upon opening and releasing the pressure and carbonation.  If in doubt, a minute out of the cooler before opening will typically take care of any issue.

About Us

We're two brothers that started a product design & development company… aptly named Conti-Bros, Inc.  Brian is a mechanical design engineer and Dan has a business background.  We see opportunity when we run across products that seem to make sense, but yet don't work well.  Typical beverage ice packs were a perfect example... we have them, but we don't use them because they just don't work well.

While we've done lots of projects of various types... over a year ago we developed a silicone grip sleeve for the very popular YETI vacuum insulated Rambler tumbler series. I still remember sitting at my kitchen island with my brother brainstorming names. Dan threw out YAKET... and we laughed and moved on with other names. But after a while, we came back to YAKET and decided to add grip to it and go with it... it seemed kinda unique and memorable. And so, the YAKET brand got it's start.

Project Status

The design work is done. We've prototyped and tested... and prototyped and tested. The production tooling is complete.  We're producing our first production units for delivery in October!

Fulfillment

We do it ourselves! Sure there are lots of services who pack and ship products to backers. Many projects utilize services that even ship directly from factories to backers. These services are just not a fit for us... we need to get the parts ourselves. We'll inspect each one before we package them up.  

Fulfillment is a lot of work, but we want to make sure everything is right! We provide a tracking number when your reward ships and we’re easy to get in touch with if there are any issues. Remember, we’ve shipped many projects before… we’ll get it done!

Join Us!

We'd like your feedback... Does the world want a better icepack? We sure think so... our experience has been that many people don't mind spending a bit more to get unique/superior performing products (and to support small entrepreneurial businesses as well). Hopefully many will support the project. We are eager to get the product into backer hands to get feedback. 

Thanks for stopping by!

Brian & Dan

story:
Your lifelong best friend, K9 co-pilot, or trusty ol’ truck in the form of a pullover hoodie.  At its core, it’s as reliable & consistent as Old Faithful itself.  This geyser, found in our back yard of Yellowstone National Park, attracts people from around the world due to its magnificence and predictability. Visitors know that when they go to see this “show”, put on by Mother Nature, that they are guaranteed an awesome experience no matter the weather, season or time of day.  

Just like the geyser, you can count on the Ol’ Faithful Pullover to be there for you through thick and thin, no matter the weather or adventure.  A companion that enables you to flow with ease from work to play, day to night, and however you choose to Give’r.  And the secret sauce?  Just wait ‘til you feel it…

Do you spend way too much time trying to decide what layers you need to wear or bring on a trip?  Are you often anxious that you will be too cold, too hot, or just not prepared?

The Ol’ Faithful Midweight Pullover is the last hoodie you’ll ever need. It is perfect for all weather and any kind of adventure. With the Ol’ Faithful, you can enjoy more flexibility and the capacity to do what you love to the maximum of your ability. 

We’ve designed the Ol’ Faithful with a kick ass blend of materials to ensure superior performance and function while enabling the versatility that mirrors our ever-evolving needs.  We’ve worked tirelessly over several years to ensure durability, comfort, functionality, and practicality, all without compromise, to create a go-to layer that will last a lifetime. 

The technical foundation is complemented by a sharp and clean aesthetic, while simultaneously (and very much covertly) ensuring your “comfort meter” is perpetually off the charts.  Don’t take our word for it, just wait ‘til you feel it.

We identified and used only premium materials to ensure superior performance from our hoodie. We wanted to make sure you could depend on Ol’ Faithful no matter what Mother Nature throws at you. We’re proud of our extensive testing and deliberation, and beyond stoked with the final result.

The 11.2 oz weight Ol’ Faithful features a dense, yet ultra-soft synthetic material that is the bread and butter of this creation.  The material is composed of two distinct elements:

The exterior of the layer contains 95% polyester and 5% spandex, providing structure and protection (like an exoskeleton) that blocks wind and precipitation, retains heat and insulates, without being cumbersome, bulky or restrictive.

The interior of the layer contains 85% polyester and 15% spandex, woven in a unique fashion resulting in the plush and cozy feel that is truly without comparison. Several testers, charged with describing the closest comparison to the feel of the material, stated the following:

Yep, it’s THAT SOFT.  The weave ensures that the softness, texture, and feel does not break down, ensuring Ol’ Faithful remains your go-to for the long haul.

Unlike many cotton or down based layers, the Ol’ Faithful is made with synthetic materials where loft and insulative properties are maintained even if they get wet, ensuring you keep warm and able to keep given’r. Additionally, the material allows for much quicker drying as the fibers don’t attach and trap water molecules.

During high activity, the performance fabric wicks moisture and sweat away from your body, regulating your temperature, much like an extension of your own skin.  This keeps you warmer, drier, and more comfortable so you’re able to bob and weave through your daily activities, enjoying the ride knowing the Ol’ Faithful has your back.

When we say that this hoodie will last you a lifetime, we mean it.  We explored hundreds of fabrics and materials, seeking a combo that was stain resistant and that wouldn’t deteriorate or shrink over time.

We did not play around...and we left no stone unturned...or fabric untested.  Wash it as much as you want and - BAM! You practically have a new hoodie each time.

Don’t believe us? Hear it from one of our testers!

Get ready for the softest, most comfortable outdoor hoodie ever. The selected material is SO SOFT and SO COMFORTABLE, you’ll feel you’re being cuddled in by a dozen puppies - all while still being protected from any weather encountered on your adventures.

The Ol’ Faithful is made of EXTREMELY soft and plush material, though it is covert to any onlooker. Seriously, you won’t believe it until you feel it.

It’s softer than your best blanket or anything you’ve ever felt. It’s the type of material that can’t be put into words...you’ll just show people and say, “you gotta feel it!”.

Over the last few years, we’ve learned a lot about sizing, fit and what people want in a midweight performance layer. We’ve spoken and listened to our Ambassadors, friends, family members, co-workers, Give’r community members and well, pretty much everyone we know or who we could convince to talk to us. As we gathered more intel, we continued to refine and craft the Ol’ Faithful to a new level of commitment.

We landed on a simply sleek, minimalist look with a slight taper so you can give’r while embracing the “look good, feel good” mentality.  Look good no matter if you’re on the slopes or out on a date - with the Ol’ Faithful, you can dress it up or dress it down, and pretty much wear it all around!

When guys and gals began trying to sneak out of the Give’r Garage still wearing the prototype (again, and again, and again)...we knew we hit the sweet spot! 

The Ol’ Faithful was designed and created to be your true go-to midweight pullover that reminds you to always give it your all in everything you do and to never hold back.

From concept and initial design through iterations and fine-tuning, we’ve maintained laser focus on the essentials and ensuring no detail was overlooked.  With the Ol’ Faithful, you will not find any unnecessary, superficial or sub-par features.

What you get is a year-round, lifelong, adventure-tested mid-layer that is superior in every aspect and on every front - from performance & functionality to comfort and style. No more, no less.

The thumbholes offer the perfect range of protection and warmth without slowing you down or restricting flexibility. Reinforced for longevity and positioned for ease of use.

Keep your phone or any other of your precious valuables safe and secure with the pocket located conveniently on your chest. No need to worry about them getting lost or falling out - the zipper will keep everything exactly where it needs to be.

Utilizing the soft, plush material along the inside of the hood easily makes this the best hood ever. The tri-panel pattern eliminates any awkward points or folds, and ensures you’re toasty, nimble and cozy for as long as you need or want.

Truly, this is the one hoodie to rule them all. No matter who you are, where you are, or what you’re wearing it for, the Ol’ Faithful is a perfect companion for your life and adventures!

Designed to be your go-to for the lifestyle you choose to live, Ol’ Faithful will live up to all of your expectations. From mowing the lawn to camping to hitting the farmers market to fall fishing. Whenever and wherever you choose to wear your hoodie, the versatility Ol’ Faithful offers quickly makes it a favorite. 

Everyone, from your significant other to your baby niece or nephew, will want to steal your Ol’ Faithful hoodie.

The unisex design makes it a great fit for anyone. Plus, it’s insanely comfortable. Can you blame them?

At Give’r, we strive to live a life with less regret. We know that living a life true to yourself requires absolute courage. This courage is not always easily accessible or common to observe throughout our day-to-day. The Ol’ Faithful isn’t just a hoodie - it’s a reminder to harness and ignite the courage inside each of us to give life our all, every day. When we align with our passion and choose to give life our all, the feeling is unmistakable and keeps the fire burning. Give’r challenges each of us to strive for more, embrace the challenge, and celebrate the good stuff in life.

The Ol’ Faithful is made with a specialized 11.2 oz weight all-synthetic material, consisting of two distinctive (yet interwoven) elements with different polyester and spandex blend ratios.  The fabric was carefully selected, following months of analyzing, testing and prototyping to ensure it met the Give’r bar for durability, functionality, ease-of-care and longevity. The material ensures no shrinkage or deformity with washing/drying and also releases stains with ease!  The material exhibits a “dual threat” of performance and comfort, with the following breakdown:

The inside of the layer contains a 85% polyester and 15% spandex blend, combined to perfection to offer stretch, insulation, moisture wicking, and comfort.  The textured interior exhibits a unique high-density of surface area to wick moisture away from your body when active, regulating your body temp and ensuring comfort throughout your activity or day.

The inside material has a plush, soft, textured and dense feel that you have to touch to believe!  We cannot stress this comfort factor enough...it is akin to the softness of a bunny rabbits ears...and constructed to retain this awesomeness over extended and rugged use for years to come.

The exterior of the layer contains a blend of 95% polyester and 5% spandex, with a structured, tighter weave that protects while still being soft and flexible.  The spandex enables flex with your movement, so you don’t have to fight against your layer when you’re out given’r.  The density of the exterior weave protects you from the wind and colder temperatures, insulating your body without being bulky or cumbersome.

It is our hope to ship these Ol’ Faithfuls by December 2018, aiming to get all units to backers before Christmas!  We have put a lot of thought into this product and what is needed to execute on the production, shipment and game plan to get into backers hands ASAP with winter knocking on the door.  We have run some serious spreadsheets, performed lots of abacus work, and months and months of communication with manufacturers, partners and mentors to wrap our heads around what it will take to ensure this Ol’ Faithful becomes a reality.  We’ve run the simulations, pushed ENTER on the TI-83, and we’re go for launch once our goal is reached!

The original version of the Ol’ Faithful was launched almost 4 years ago in the form of the Midweight All Sport.

While the original design, style and intent of the product was a huge success for us, we received tremendous feedback from our community for ways to improve upon the solid foundation of a midweight pullover layer. Most notably, we listened to our customers’ feedback on sizing, material, color, and design.  

Our first step was to search for the right material. Over several years we attended trade shows, met with fabric pros, spoke with countless manufacturers and developed a better understanding of what was out there and what we were seeking. We created several prototypes, testing along the way different fabric contents, and continually returned to the need for material without any cotton content. Diving deeper still, we started examining dual-layered poly and spandex blends, some heavy, some light, some soft, some structured. The first day we felt the material that has become the core of the Ol’ Faithful, we knew we were on to something!

Once this material was selected, we embarked upon a journey of prototyping, testing, tweaking and repeating. This occurred over the last 2 years, where we’ve gone through 5 major rounds of prototyping and testing to get things dialed!

At long last, in round 6.0, we feel we’ve finally nailed it, and our testers/visitors agree. We now find ourselves tremendously excited to bring this vision to life, knowing that the juice was worth the squeeze over the last 2 years learning and getting things done right.  Such is the Give’r way, and we do not take this lightly.

The material is supremely rad, albeit a bit more costly to create.  This, along with a larger required order quantity, brings us to you, our loyal and most righteous backers. Help us bring this beauty to life and empower the world to Give’r in a whole new way!

We are psyched to share this project with you, as it has been a long time comin’!  The Ol’ Faithful is the result of many years, tons of experimentation and testing and loads of feedback from you, our community.  We have listened, learned, tried and tried again, exhibiting patience, persistence and determination every step of the way.

We pride ourselves in creating products that are of the best quality and that carry with them the ethos of our brand, Give’r.  We give our all when it comes to creating product solutions, and we design with you in mind. We know how powerful subtle and tangible reminders can be to encourage us to give life our all - so we always give our absolute best in everything we do.

The Ol’ Faithful Midweight Pullover is truly a rad creation. The realities of the material, construction and complexities of the manufacturing is such that we aren’t able to produce it without your help.

Join us. With your pledge and support, we can come together and collectively give’r - bringing The Ol’ Faithful to life.

story:
Short Summary

It started with a college student who had too many devices in her flat. My laptops, camera, smartphones, power bank, table, stereo … they all need be plugged in, usually at the same time. There was really not much space to spare in my tiny apartment; the bulky power strips I used was just taking a lot of unnecessary space, not to mention the thick messy cables flying all around.

 

As a frequent traveller, I know that travel adapter is a necessity on the trip. But not many people realize that power strip, is also a necessity. We complain that there’s not enough electric socket or USB charging port at the airport and in the hotel. The reality is, we need power strips while traveling, but we don’t bring them. And the reason is simple: Power strips, or power cubes, are way too bulky; and they aren’t able to adapt to different socket types. The fact is, there is no power strip on the market, Kickstarter projects included, that is able to keep its cord under control: cord storage and length adjustability are essential, but lacking in all the power strips out there.

The idea of MOGICS Power Donut (and Bagel, which is an universal version of Donut - UK, EU, AU, US) is to design something elegant and powerful. Integrating with the MOGICS Adapter, we are able to combine both the functions of a power strip and a travel adapter - both of which are conventionally big and bulky - to create the perfect travel solution, with added perks such as Integrated Length-adjustable Cord, spare Safety Fuse, dual USB ports supporting Fast Charge, as well as an ergonomically designed AC plug -- all this, light and slim enough to slide effortlessly in your pocket.

On the other hand, when I’m not traveling, MOGICS Power Donut serves as the best power strip (or power ring) in my daily life; keeping my desk neat and impeccably organized. Sharing the power on-the-go, and saving the space when you're alone.

 

 

Product Spec.

Donut  vs Bagel

Integrated Safety Fuse 

Apart from the integrated Safety Fuse we already installed inside, for added security, an additional spare fuse (also 6.3A) is stored within MOGICS Power Donut as well as Bagel. 

 

Dual USB Fast Charge  & LED Power Indicator 

Supports 2.0A USB Fast Charge, and with 2 USB ports, MOGICS Power Donut and Bagel gives you a more efficient charging experience.

 A brilliant blue LED indicator lights up when Donut or Bagel is plugged into an AC socket source; when you see blue light, you'll know power is connected.

for Indiegogo backer, we have new version carry case for every single donut and bagel. 

 

Production & Delivery

We have already successfully produced the first batch of MOGICS Donut & Bagel, which have been shipped out and received. We plan to product a second batch of Donut & Bagel, in which we would need funds to order the components and acquire raw materials -- this allows us to provide backers such as yourself a lower than retail price value as a thank you.

Risks & Challenges

Due to the particularly small size of the Mogics Power Donut and Bagel, we had to use small components and figure out ways to integrate everything to optimise the design.

To minimize the defection rate during mass production upon successful Kickstarter campaign will require high skills and immense patience. We have done the EVT and moving on to the DVT and PVT now. Our team has a very strong background for design for manufacturing. We have the parts sourcing, manufacturing flow and testing procedures well defined. If the demand is high, we will be able to scale production and logistics accordingly.

story:
Share on facebook Share on Pinterest Share on Twitter

Share on Linkedin Share on Google Share in E-Mail

Dear fellow tradesmen, DIY'ers and friends,

My name is Dennis Pawlak and I have been working in construction and doing home repairs and improvements for over 25 years.  In that time I have done just about everything from minor repairs to full rehabs.   One thing that seems to always happen is I misplace my pen or marker, maybe it's just me or maybe you can relate and have done this yourself.  

Over the years I have wasted hours and hours of time looking for it or having to go find where I left it.   Not only that, but sometimes when you have your pen or marker and you are trying to hold something in place to mark you have to try and hold on to the pen and not drop it.   If you do then you have to realign what you are trying to mark and do it all again.   That is why I developed the Instant Marker idea.  

You can wear it while you work and it leaves your hands free to do whatever you need to but when you need to make a mark you just make a fist and mark instantly.   No taking your hand off your work and reaching for the pen in your pocket (if you still have it there) just make a fist and mark.    I have been using it now and it is very helpful, plus while you have it on you still have full range of movement and can do your work like normal.  

I have come up with several inventions over the years but this one I think just about everyone that does work where you need to mark things will relate too.  It can be very helpful if you do carpentry, drywalling, flooring, tiling, siding, crafts or any other trade that requires marking things.  Instant Marker can hold a pen, pencil and is best suited for a mini marker.

Instant Marker is a simple yet very effective concept that can make doing that everyday project so much faster and more efficient and save you the frustration of always trying to find your marker.

By ordering yours now you will help to build up a large enough inventory to approach the contacts I have already made at a major hardware chain for distribution and to hopefully get it on the HSN.    I hope you will order one today, it would also make a great gift for the handyman in your life. 

This is the most important part, if you order one or not please help make this a success by passing this on to everyone you can through Twitter, Facebook, Pintrest, Google, Linkedin, family and friends and any other outlet you can utilize to share this on the internet.  The only way something like this can be a success is with your help.

As a bonus for everyone that orders an Instant Marker I will send you a digital copy of a cd called "Kindred Saint" that is all original 80's rock style music that my sons Jason, Trevor and I recorded.   If you like 80's style hard rock I think you will enjoy this and it's FREE with your order.

Thank you for your time and interest and please dont forget to share this.

Dennis Pawlak

Dear fellow tradesmen, DIY'ers and friends, My name is Dennis Pawlak and I have been working in construction and doing home repairs and improvements for over 25 years.  In that time I have done just about everything from minor repairs to full rehabs.   One thing that seems to always happen is I misplace my pen or marker, maybe it's just me or maybe you can relate and have done this yourself.   Over the years I have wasted hours and hours of time looking for it or having to go find where I left it.   Not only that, but sometimes when you have your pen or marker and you are trying to hold something in place to mark you have to try and hold on to the pen and not drop it.   If you do then you have to realign what you are trying to mark and do it all again.   That is why I developed the Instant Marker idea.   You can wear it while you work and it leaves your hands free to do whatever you need to but when you need to make a mark you just make a fist and mark instantly.   No taking your hand off your work and reaching for the pen in your pocket (if you still have it there) just make a fist and mark.    I have been using it now and it is very helpful, plus while you have it on you still have full range of movement and can do your work like normal.   I have come up with several inventions over the years but this one I think just about everyone that does work where you need to mark things will relate too.  It can be very helpful if you do carpentry, drywalling, flooring, tiling, siding, crafts or any other trade that requires marking things.  Instant Marker can hold a pen, pencil and is best suited for a mini marker.Instant Marker is a simple yet very effective concept that can make 
doing that everyday project so much faster and more efficient and save 
you the frustration of always trying to find your marker.By ordering yours now you will help to build up a large enough inventory to approach the contacts I have already made at a major hardware chain for distribution and to hopefully get it on the HSN.    I hope you will order one today, it would also make a great gift for the handyman in your life.
