story:
Epic Run App - 

The Ultimate Running Experience

Don't miss out on the awesome t-shirts you can get only now!!

I love running. But let's face it, it can be boring.... no longer...

Epic Run App is a free GPS tracker for your phone. You can track runs and share them online, but it also uses your GPS to mixes an audio story with your music playlist and it creates an engaging story around your run. It sends you on a journey to save the world. You will be chased. You will have to avoid danger. You will have to run... 

Anybody can create stories and offer them through Epic Run App. That is what the platform is for! We hope to create a diverse offering of different types of stories and make all of your runs EPIC!


Get your T-shirt and help us create great and enteraining GPS tracker!


The initial story (part of many, which might even be user-submitted!): Imagine a post-apocalyptic world, after a pandemic virus has left only few people alive. You are an agent of a secret government trying to save what's left of humanity. You'll get (audio) missions, mixed in with your music playlist, based on your GPS while your running statistics are displayed. You can earn points by finishing missions and by running faster and longer. See how well you do in the high-score listing!

Why is Epic Run App unique? How does it differ from Zombies, run! We want to make running an entertaining activity, not limited to our story, but allow everybody to contribute. We hope to create a platform where multiple stories can be offered. You could look at it as a type of television station, which offers multiple series from which the user can select one. In time, we want to offer stories in multiple languages (Dutch, French, etc). Offering specific training programs for 5k and 10k are also on our to do list. No more counting minutes during your run, to know if you have to accelerate or slow down, the storyline will have this built in! We want to create unique platform with Epic Run App by incorporating all these aspects.

I am a PhD researcher, I work with computer algorithms and music. Being involved with audio every day and going out for a run in the evening, I got the idea to combine both and create this audio adventure.

I have been dreaming of building this app for about a year until finally I just started doing it. As by wonder, I found a group of people interested and willing to help me do it. A great writer, an audio actor, a graphic-talent and a programming wiz crossed my path at about the same time. It's seemed like the Universe thought the time was right for Epic Run App to be born. 

Besides my passion for music and audio. I love sports and I always seem to want to take them to the extreme (kind of like I did with Epic Run App!). I am very much into running, bouldering (a type of technical climbing without ropes), but I am also a rescue diver, I drove drove my motorcycle alone to Italy and I climbed a vulcano in Indonesia! Who know what crazy things will happen in Epic Run App! It's a whole new concept! 

Your donation could help millions of runners enjoy their run and thus help keep their bodies healthy! Let's taking the boring out of running.


What We Need & What You Get

Most funding is needed to actually finish programming the app.

Programming a user-friendly app takes time and resources. We are self funding everything right now out of our own pockets. We'll use the money from this campaign to get a lot of the programming done, make sure it is a bug free and nicely designed app for iOS (and later on for Android with your support). Currently, the back-end is already in place, but we need more resources to polish and finish the app.

On the creative part of the project, we'll invest money in decent recording equipment (hiss free microphone etc), make time to write the stories, record and produce them. 

Graphics will be designed for optimal user experience and the website will allow sharing of runs via facebook/runkeeper/etc... You will also be able to download your GPS data (gpx format).

We will also invest in promotion and advertisement of the app and conversion from iPhone to Android.

As you see, a lot of work needs to be done. But our team is ready for it! We are so excited to work on this project!

We are making this for you! We hope to have Epic Run App available for your phone by spring (summer at the latest) when it's time to go running again! Every run you make with the app will be as a secret agent saving the world! (who ever said running is boring?).

We thought of some nice perks for sponsors, so please give us a nudge, our team will be forever grateful! The more fund we get, the more of a professional app we can deliver.

Even if we don't reach the entire goal, your donation, however small, will give us a push to keep working on this product. If we go over the goal, we will make the app even better, include more and more seasons, more features, make it really easy to use, even more stories and invest in creating a real community around it.


Get in style with the T-shirt and running outfit!

Secret agents might be secret, but they don't go out of style! Our designer is working on a t-shirt and a full running outfit. Grab one while you can! (see Trail runner and Secret angent sponsorship package).


Get the poster!

Get totally emerged in the experience. We're developing a big poster to get you totally into the game, even at home! Check out the Trail runner sponsorship package. Don't miss out while you can!


Make running fun again! 

Your donation helps millions of runners enjoy their run and thus help keep their bodies healthy! Let's taking the boring out of running.

Epic Run App turns running in an entertaining, captive experience where you are the main character. You have to run to survive and save humanity...


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute and receive any of the amazing gifts, you can still help us!

  • Help us get the work out and tell your friends.
  • Send people our video.
  • Use the share tools on this site to share this on facebook and other sites!
  • Follow us on twitter or add EpicRunApp on facebook.

With your support, Epic Run App will be available by this spring or summer at the latest.

Take a peak from time to time at our website to follow how we are doing:

epicrunapp.com.


If you have a question, just ask and we will be glad to clarify for you! Or incorporate your ideas in the app we are developing!

story:
"You are one of our Manhattan Beach heroes." Bob & Mary Ann Brigham.

Manhattan Beach Mayor Pro-Tem David Lesser has endorsed Mitch Ward's re-election to the Manhattan Beach City Council for March 5, 2013.  We welcome your endorsement as well.

For eight years former councilmember Mitch Ward has successfully worked hard to ensure the City of Manhattan Beach has yearly balanced budgets, yearly surpluses and a AAA financial rating. Your support for Mitch Ward will make sure we continue this fiscal distinction.
Mitch Ward will continue to work with fellow elected leaders in Manhattan Beach to ensure 1) our city maintain the enjoyable and safe living environment which we all expect and love,  2) continue our fiscal (budgetary) preeminence, 3) nurture our strong and vibrant educational institutions and business community.

Please support Mitch Ward's campaign with a small donation of $5 or more.    Thank you so very much for contributing and please ask a friend or family member to do the same.  And also forward this link to your email list, linkedin page and facebook friends.

Above all thank  you in advance for sharing one of your three votes with Mitch Ward on March 5, 2013.

We welcome your endorsement.  http://www.mitchward.com/join.html

________

Paid for by Mitch Ward for Manhattan Beach City Council Committee 2013 FPPC #130202

Please visit mitchward.com for a list of endorsements and to add your name as a local supporter.  Thank you.

story:
*** for English Summary pls scroll down (after the FAQ) ***

© SUN TRIP 2013



E-Bikes sind langweilig und nur was für Oma und Opa? Von wegen! Denn diesen Sommer werden wir im Zuge des Sun Trip 2015 mit einem E-Bike bis Kasachstan radeln und damit beweisen, dass man auch mit „Hilfsmotor“ außergewöhnliche Abenteuer erleben und richtig Spaß haben kann – und DU kannst ein Teil davon sein!

Der Sun Trip ist jedoch kein gewöhnliches E-Bike Abenteuer! Es geht darum, eine etwa 8.000 Kilometer lange Reise mit solarbetriebenen E-Bikes zu bewältigen. Die Entwicklung der Solar E-Bikes erfolgt durch die Teilnehmer selbst. Das internationale Starterfeld, bestehend aus 23 Teams, muss den gesamten Strombedarf während der etwa 2 ½ Monate langen Reise ausschließlich mit Sonnenenergie abdecken!

  • 8.000 Kilometer
  • 23 Teams, 14 Nationen
  • Auf eigene Faust, ohne Backup-Teams
  • Im ständigen Kampf gegen die Elemente
  • Only supported by the sun

Als „Team Austria“ sind wir als erstes deutschsprachiges Gespann mit dabei und werden zeigen, wie vielseitig Sonnenenergie und Elektromobilität heute eingesetzt werden können. Kurz gesagt: Der Sun Trip 2015  - ein abgefahrenes Abenteuer mit hohem Nachhaltigkeitsfaktor!

**UPDATE**
Aufgrund des Wegfalls eines essenziellen Hauptsponsors der Organisatoren, kam es leider zu einer massiven Änderung des gesamten Rennkonzepts: Offiziell führt die Strecke nun von Italien in die Türkei und über den Balkan wieder zurück an den Ausgangspunkt. Für uns und einige andere Teams war diese Entscheidung eine bittere Enttäuschung … Nach Absprache mit der Organisation werden wir die Reise nun trotz der Änderungen gemeinsam mit drei anderen Teams als „SUN TRIP Solar Ambassadors“ bis nach Kasachstan fortsetzen und somit die Ursprungsidee am Leben erhalten!



Aber nicht nur um die Teilnahme am Sun Trip geht es uns: Nach dem Erfolg mit unserer zweifach prämierten Live-Reportage (Vortrag) „Rückenwind – mit dem Rad um die Welt“ soll eine neue Live-Reportage über diesen irrwitzigen Roadtrip entstehen. Wir nehmen Euch mit Rückenwind und viel Humor mit auf ein neues Abenteuer. Vorbei an atemberaubenden Landschaften, pulsierenden Städten, lachenden Gesichtern. Bei Regen, Wind und Sonnenschein, durch dick und dünn – bis tief hinein in die flirrende Hitze der unendlichen kasachischen Steppe. Frei nach unserem wohlbekannten Motto:

Raus aus der Tretmühle – rauf auf den Drahtesel!



Schon mit unserer Radweltreise-Reportage haben wir viele Menschen inspiriert und begeistert – und einige sogar dazu bewegt, etwas in ihrem Leben zu ändern! Das macht uns richtig glücklich – und genau dort wollen wir anknüpfen.

Wir sind überzeugt, dass unser ungewöhnliches Solar-Gespann auf dem Weg nach Kasachstan viel Aufmerksamkeit erregen wird und uns dadurch wieder viele spannende Begegnungen sicher sind. Diese Momente werden wir einfangen und mit Dir in unserer neuen Live-Reportage teilen!

Unser Ziel ist es, dass Du nach unserem Vortrag mit einem breiten Grinsen im Gesicht und voller Inspiration aus dem Saal marschierst. Du sollst das Verlangen verspüren, dich sofort auf Dein eigenes (E-)Bike zu schwingen um die Welt zu entdecken … und das Gefühl haben, dass all unsere Möglichkeiten schier grenzenlos sind!

Unsere Zielgruppe ist bunt durchgemischt: abenteuerlustige Youngsters und sportbegeisterte Menschen. Enthusiastische Radfahrer – egal ob Mountainbiker, Renn- oder Reiseradler. „Ganz normale“ Leute, die selbst nie auf die Idee kommen würden so etwas Verrücktes zu machen. Sinnsuchende, die Inspirationen für alternative Lebenskonzepte suchen … Eines können wir versprechen: Bei uns wird JEDER auf seine Kosten kommen!





Wir lieben Radfahren, sind von der Idee und dem nachhaltigen Konzept des Sun Trip fasziniert und können es kaum erwarten endlich loszufahren! Mindestens genauso viel Freude macht uns der Gedanke, danach eine neue Live-Reportage zu produzieren und Dich damit nach Kasachstan mitzuehmen!



Die Finanzierung unserer Teilnahme am Sun Trip, und vor allem die Entwicklung und Umsetzung unseres Solar-E-Tandems, geht jedoch über unsere derzeitigen finanziellen Möglichkeiten hinaus.

Mit Deiner Unterstützung ist es uns möglich, das Projekt auf hohem, professionellen Niveau durchzuführen und Dir danach einen unvergesslichen Vortragsabend zu bescheren!

Falls Du an uns glaubst und ebenso fasziniert bist vom Sun Trip wie wir, unterstütze uns und werde ein Teil des „Team Austria“!

Zu unserer Suntrip-Website geht´s hier: http://suntrip.nandita.at/



Die Einnahmen aus dieser Kampagne werden zwar nicht das gesamte Vorhaben finanzieren, uns aber trotzdem enorm helfen, unsere Idee umzusetzen!



  • Ein erheblicher Teil des Geldes fließt in die professionelle Entwicklung und Umsetzung unseres Solar-E-Tandems. Das Bike wird mit einem leichten Solar-Dach mit zwei monokristallinen Dünnschichtpaneelen ausgestattet, welche die Energie zum Laden unserer Akkus liefern werden.
  • Ein weiterer Teil des Budgets fließt in die Produktion der Dankeschöns, die Du als Gegenleistung für Deine finanzielle Unterstützung erhältst - wie zum Beispiel  das stylishe "Team Austria SUPPORTER TRIKOT" in bewährter Löffler-Qualität!

  • Etwas Geld wird auch für die Durchführung der Crowdfunding-Kampagne selbst benötigt: die Produktion des Vorstellungs-Videos, Transaktions- und Plattformgebühren, Werbung etc …




Unsere Crowdfunding-Kampagne läuft 40 Tage und endet am 29. Mai 2015. Wenn Ihr unser Projekt toll findet dann erzählt all Euren Freunden, Familien und Arbeitskollegen davon! Teilt die Kampagne via Social-Media (Facebook, Twitter & Co). Schreibt in Eurem Blog darüber, schickt E-Mails an Eure Kontakte und helft uns, so viele Menschen wie möglich zu erreichen! Denn nur gemeinsam können wir es schaffen! DANKE!!


nandita – Anita Burgholzer & Andreas Hübl – aus Steyr, Oberösterreich. Ein „ganz gewöhnliches“ Reiseradlerpaar mit oftmals verrückten Ideen. „Frau nandita“ ist 34 Jahre alt, „Herr nandita“ zählt 39 Lenze. Seit dreizehn Jahren ein Paar, das immer schon gerne loszog, um die Welt hautnah zu entdecken.

Die gemeinsame Passion von Anita & Andreas ist das Reisen mit dem Fahrrad. Was 2007 mit einer vierwöchigen „Probetour“ durch den Jemen begann, fand zwischen Mai 2010 und September 2012 seinen Höhepunkt: Eine Fahrradweltreise, die sie und ihre Drahtesel in 844 Tagen auf knapp 36.500 Kilometer durch drei Kontinente und 35 Länder bringen sollte. Dieser einzigartige Roadtrip prägte das Leben der beiden nachhaltig, es war ihr Einstieg in die professionelle Vortragsreferenten-Szene.

Mit ihrer zweifach prämierten Live-Reportage „Rückenwind – Mit dem Rad um die Welt“ touren Anita & Andreas seit Herbst 2013 sehr erfolgreich durch Österreich und Deutschland. Das gleichnamige Buch erschien mittlerweile in der 3. Auflage. Regelmäßige Veröffentlichungen in renommierten Tageszeitungen und Magazinen (SportAktiv, Sonntags-Krone, Salzburger Nachrichten, OÖN, RAUS! …), sowie Auftritte in Radio und TV (Ö1, ORF2, div. Regionale Radiosender) „runden“ das Portfolio ab.

  • Anita Burgholzer, geboren 1980. Ganz im Ernst aber auch für jeden Spaß zu haben.  “Kreativer” Part von nandita und auch der weibliche. Anita hat ihr kreatives Händchen in renommierten Werbeagenturen bewiesen und ist seit einigen Jahren als Grafikdesignerin selbstständig. Nebenbei tourt sie gemeinsam mit Andreas als Vortragsreferentin durch Österreich und Deutschland. Sie liebt die Natur und isst für ihr Leben gerne Pommes.
  • Andreas Hübl, geboren 1976. Männlich, schnell, Kilometerfräse. Zuständig für Organisation, Presse & Technik. Andreas hat nach mehrjähriger Wirtschaftstätigkeit seinem Dasein als Einkäufer Lebewohl gesagt. Im Sommer arbeitet  er als Mountainbike-Guide, im Winter hält er gemeinsam mit Anita Vorträge, kümmert sich um die Vermarktung des Buchs und tüftelt an neuen Projekten. Er hat die unglaubliche Fähigkeit, trotz seines geringen Kampfgewichts von 69 Kilo Unmengen an Essbarem in sich hineinzustopfen.










Was ist Crowdfunding?

Die genaue Übersetzung würde „Schwarmfinanzierung“ heißen. Statt eines einzelnen Geldgebers tragen viele zur Finanzierung eines Projekts oder Produkts bei: die Crowd, eine Masse von Leuten. Der Unterschied zu einer normalen Spendenaktion ist aber, dass Du eine Gegenleistung für Deinen Beitrag bekommst. Du bezahlst sozusagen per Vorauskassa für ein Dankeschön Deiner Wahl – und das finden wir super!


Wie funktioniert der Spendenprozess?

Das Spenden ist in 3 einfache Schritte gegliedert. Zuerst wählst Du auf der Hauptseite unserer Kampagne Dein Dankeschön (im Fachjargon heißt das „Perk“) aus. In Schritt 1 hast Du die (optionale) Möglichkeit, einen zusätzlichen Betrag als Geschenk festzulegen. Darunter kannst Du ein Häkchen setzen, wenn Dein Name nicht auf der Kampagnenseite gezeigt werden soll. Unterhalb des Pflichtfelds für eine E-Mail Adresse gibst Du Deine Adresse an, an die wir nach erfolgreicher Kampagne Dein Dankeschön versenden werden. In Schritt 2 geht’s zur Bezahlung via Paypal bzw. Kreditkarte und in Schritt 3 hast Du die Möglichkeit, unsere Kampagne via Facebook etc. zu teilen.


Wie funktioniert der Bezahlprozess?

Bei Indiegogo gibt es nur die Möglichkeit, mit Paypal oder Kreditkarte zu bezahlen. Auch Kreditkartenzahlungen werden von Paypal abgewickelt, einen Account bei Paypal brauchst Du dafür aber nicht. Das heißt: Am Ende des Spendenprozesses kannst Du dich entweder bei Paypal einloggen oder direkt Deine Kreditkartennummer eingeben. Diese Daten bekommt nur Paypal, sie werden nicht an uns oder Indiegogo weitergereicht. Paypal bestätigt uns lediglich den Zahlungseingang. Keine Kreditkarte? Bitte einfach den nächsten Punkt lesen!


Kann ich euer tolles Projekt auch ohne Kreditkarte oder PayPal unterstützen?

Falls Du keine Kreditkarte besitzt und /oder uns lieber per Überweisung unterstützen möchtest, kannst Du den Wunschbetrag gerne an folgendes Konto überweisen: nandita / Reisen & Live-Reportagen OG, Wehrgrabengasse 85b/1, 4400 Steyr. IBAN: AT191511000921181350, BIC: OBKLAT2L

Bitte vergiss nicht, uns Deinen Namen, Deine E-Mail Adresse und das gewünschte Dankeschön mitzuteilen. Wir werden Deinen Betrag dann „manuell“ bei Indiegogo einpflegen und, falls von dir gewünscht, dich in der Unterstützer-Liste eintragen.


Wie sicher sind meine Daten?

Die Verbindung mit Indiegogo ist verschlüsselt, ebenso die Verbindung zu Paypal. Du kannst einstellen, welche Daten über Deine Spende öffentlich angezeigt werden sollen.



***************************   ENGLISH SUMMARY   **************************


On a Solar-Powered E-Tandem to Kazakhstan – become part of TEAM AUSTRIA!


E-Bikes are boring and only fun for granny and grandpa? Nonsense! This summer, we will prove the opposite! We will be participating at “The Sun Trip” Solar-Bicycle race and ride a specially designed E-Bike tandem from Italy to Kazakhstan. We want to show that E-motor assistance can be real fun and gonna have a unique, crazy adventure – and YOU can be a part of it!

The Sun Trip is no “normal” E-Bike adventure. The challenge is to ride 8.000 kilometres with SOLAR-POWERED E-Bikes! The design and realization of the bike has to be tackled by the teams themselves. The international field of participants, consisting of 23 teams, has to generate the whole energy-demand during the 2 ½ months trip exclusively with solar power!

  • 8.000 Kilometres
  • 23 teams, 14 nations
  • On their own, no backup-team
  • Constantly fighting against the elements
  • Only supported by the sun

As Team Austria, we will be the first and only German-speaking participants at The Sun Trip. We want to show the endless possibilities of alternative energy sources and E-Mobility. In short: The Sun Trip 2015 – a unique, sustainable adventure!

**UPDATE**
Due to the rejection of an essential sponsor, the organizers of The Sun Trip had to massively change the whole architecture of the race: Officially, the route will go from Italy to Turkey and via the Balkans back to Italy. For us and three other teams, this decision was a big disappointment … After constructive discussions with the organizers we and the other three teams will keep the original Sun Trip route alive and continue as “Sun Trip Solar Ambassadors” to Kazakhstan.

It´s not only about the participation at The Sun Trip: Since we had a lot of success with our Live-Documentary (live-photo- and video presentation) “Tailwind – on bicycles around the world”, we want to produce a new presentation about this crazy adventure! We want to take you with us! With a lot of tailwind and humour – passing breath-taking landscapes, vibrant cities, smiling faces. Through rain, wind and sunshine – until we finally reach the shimmering heat of the endless Kazakh steppe. According to our motto:

Get out of the comfort zone – hop on your bike!


Goals, target group


With the Live-Presentations about our world-cycle adventure, we could inspire so many people – and could bring a few of them to change something in their lives! This makes us very happy and motivates us to continue our way!

We are more than convinced that our solar-vehicle will attract a lot of attention during the trip. For sure we will be having many exiting encounters and meeting inspiring people. Exactly these moments we will capture and share with you in our new Live-Documentary!

After visiting our presentation, you should wear a big smile on your face. You shall be full of energy and inspiration. You will feel the desire to discover our wonderful planet and start your own big (E-Bike) adventure right now! You will feel that all our possibilities are unlimited!

Our target group is hard to define: adventurous youngsters and enthusiastic sportsmen. All kinds of cyclists – no matter if they are mountainbikers, road- or travel cyclists. “Normal” people who would not even think about cycling 8.000 kilometres to Kazakhstan – on a solar-powered tandem! People in quest for meaning, looking for alternative concepts of living … There´s one thing we can promise: Anyone visiting our Live-Documentary will have a great time!


Why should I support your project?


We love cycling, are more than convinced of the sustainable concept of The Sun Trip and we can´t wait to hit the road! The funding of our participation, and especially the design and realization of our solar-bike goes beyond our financial possibilities.

With YOUR support, we will be able to participate at The Sun Trip on a professional level – and afterwards we will be able to share in all our adventures with you – in our new Live-Documentary! If you believe in us and share our fascination for The Sun Trip, support us and become part of „Team Austria!


Spread the word!


Our campaign runs 40 days and ends on May 29th 2015. If you think: “Wow, these dudes are cool”, please tell all your friends, family and colleagues! Share our campaign via Social Media ((Facebook, Twitter & Co). Write in your blog, send mails to your contacts and help us to reach as many people as possible! Because only TOGETHER we can make it! THANKS!


About Anita & Andreas


Anita Burgholzer and Andreas Hübl met back in 2002 in their birth city Steyr, Austria. They soon encountered their common passion: Travelling. From the beginning, they did extended trips, such as Australia, Yemen, Southeast-Asia … In 2010, they realized their dream and cycled around the globe for 28 months. Today, Anita works as a self-employed graphic designer. Andreas left his career as a business economist behind and now guides mountain bike trips over the Alps. Additionally, both wrote a book and hold regular speeches on their adventures.
story_txt:
*** for English Summary pls scroll down (after the FAQ) ***© SUN TRIP 2013E-Bikes sind langweilig und nur was
für Oma und Opa? Von wegen! Denn diesen Sommer werden wir im Zuge des Sun Trip 2015 mit einem E-Bike bis Kasachstan radeln und damit
beweisen, dass man auch mit „Hilfsmotor“ außergewöhnliche Abenteuer erleben und
richtig Spaß haben kann – und DU
kannst ein Teil davon sein!Der Sun Trip ist jedoch kein
gewöhnliches E-Bike Abenteuer! Es geht darum, eine etwa 8.000 Kilometer lange Reise mit solarbetriebenen E-Bikes zu bewältigen. Die Entwicklung der Solar E-Bikes erfolgt durch die Teilnehmer selbst. Das
internationale Starterfeld, bestehend aus 23 Teams, muss den gesamten
Strombedarf während der etwa 2 ½ Monate
langen Reise ausschließlich mit
Sonnenenergie abdecken!
8.000 Kilometer
23 Teams, 14 Nationen
Auf eigene Faust, ohne Backup-Teams
Im ständigen Kampf gegen die Elemente
Only supported by the sun
Als „Team Austria“ sind wir als erstes deutschsprachiges Gespann mit
dabei und werden zeigen, wie vielseitig Sonnenenergie und Elektromobilität
heute eingesetzt werden können. Kurz gesagt: Der Sun Trip 2015  - ein
abgefahrenes Abenteuer mit hohem Nachhaltigkeitsfaktor!**UPDATE**Aufgrund des Wegfalls eines
 essenziellen Hauptsponsors der Organisatoren, kam es
 leider zu einer massiven Änderung des gesamten 
Rennkonzepts: Offiziell führt die Strecke nun von Italien in die
 Türkei und über den Balkan wieder zurück an den Ausgangspunkt. Für uns und einige andere Teams war diese Entscheidung eine bittere Enttäuschung … Nach Absprache mit der Organisation werden wir die Reise nun trotz der Änderungen
 gemeinsam mit drei anderen Teams als „SUN TRIP Solar Ambassadors“ bis 
nach Kasachstan fortsetzen und somit die Ursprungsidee am Leben 
erhalten!Aber nicht nur um die Teilnahme am Sun
Trip geht es uns: Nach dem Erfolg mit unserer zweifach prämierten Live-Reportage (Vortrag) „Rückenwind – mit dem Rad um die Welt“ soll
eine neue Live-Reportage über diesen irrwitzigen
Roadtrip entstehen. Wir nehmen Euch mit Rückenwind und viel Humor mit
auf ein neues Abenteuer. Vorbei an atemberaubenden Landschaften, pulsierenden
Städten, lachenden Gesichtern. Bei Regen, Wind und Sonnenschein, durch dick und
dünn – bis tief hinein in die flirrende Hitze der unendlichen kasachischen
Steppe. Frei nach unserem wohlbekannten Motto:
Raus
aus der Tretmühle – rauf auf den Drahtesel!

Schon mit unserer
Radweltreise-Reportage haben wir viele Menschen inspiriert und begeistert – und
einige sogar dazu bewegt, etwas in ihrem Leben zu ändern! Das macht uns richtig glücklich – und genau dort wollen wir anknüpfen.Wir sind überzeugt, dass unser
ungewöhnliches Solar-Gespann auf dem Weg nach Kasachstan viel Aufmerksamkeit
erregen wird und uns dadurch wieder viele spannende Begegnungen sicher sind. Diese Momente werden wir einfangen und mit Dir in unserer neuen Live-Reportage
teilen!

Unser Ziel ist es, dass Du nach
unserem Vortrag mit einem breiten Grinsen im Gesicht und voller Inspiration aus
dem Saal marschierst. Du sollst das Verlangen verspüren, dich sofort auf Dein
eigenes (E-)Bike zu schwingen um die Welt zu entdecken … und das Gefühl haben,
dass all unsere Möglichkeiten schier grenzenlos sind!
Unsere Zielgruppe ist bunt durchgemischt: abenteuerlustige Youngsters und
sportbegeisterte Menschen.
Enthusiastische Radfahrer – egal ob Mountainbiker, Renn- oder Reiseradler.
„Ganz normale“ Leute, die selbst nie auf die Idee kommen würden so etwas
Verrücktes zu machen. Sinnsuchende, die Inspirationen für alternative Lebenskonzepte suchen … Eines können wir versprechen: Bei uns wird JEDER auf seine Kosten kommen!


Wir
lieben Radfahren,
sind von der Idee und dem nachhaltigen
Konzept des Sun Trip fasziniert und können es kaum erwarten endlich
loszufahren! Mindestens genauso viel Freude macht uns der Gedanke, danach eine neue Live-Reportage zu produzieren und Dich damit
nach Kasachstan mitzuehmen!
Die Finanzierung unserer Teilnahme am
Sun Trip, und vor allem die Entwicklung und Umsetzung unseres
Solar-E-Tandems, geht jedoch über unsere derzeitigen finanziellen
Möglichkeiten hinaus.Mit Deiner Unterstützung ist es uns möglich, das Projekt auf hohem, professionellen Niveau durchzuführen
und Dir danach einen unvergesslichen
Vortragsabend zu bescheren!Falls Du an uns glaubst und ebenso fasziniert bist vom Sun Trip wie wir, unterstütze uns und werde ein Teil des
„Team Austria“!
Zu unserer Suntrip-Website geht´s
hier: http://suntrip.nandita.at/

Die Einnahmen aus dieser Kampagne
werden zwar nicht das gesamte Vorhaben finanzieren, uns aber trotzdem enorm
helfen, unsere Idee umzusetzen!


Ein
erheblicher Teil des Geldes fließt in die professionelle
Entwicklung und Umsetzung unseres Solar-E-Tandems. Das Bike wird mit einem
leichten Solar-Dach mit zwei monokristallinen Dünnschichtpaneelen ausgestattet,
welche die Energie zum Laden unserer Akkus liefern werden.


Ein
weiterer Teil des Budgets fließt in die Produktion
der Dankeschöns, die Du als Gegenleistung für Deine finanzielle Unterstützung
erhältst - wie zum Beispiel  das stylishe "Team Austria SUPPORTER TRIKOT" in bewährter Löffler-Qualität!


Etwas Geld
wird auch für die Durchführung der
Crowdfunding-Kampagne selbst benötigt: die Produktion des
Vorstellungs-Videos, Transaktions- und Plattformgebühren, Werbung etc …

Unsere Crowdfunding-Kampagne läuft 40 Tage und endet am 29. Mai 2015. Wenn Ihr unser Projekt toll findet dann erzählt all Euren Freunden, Familien und Arbeitskollegen davon! Teilt die Kampagne via Social-Media
(Facebook, Twitter & Co). Schreibt
in Eurem Blog darüber, schickt E-Mails an Eure Kontakte und helft uns, so viele
Menschen wie möglich zu erreichen! Denn nur
gemeinsam können wir es schaffen! DANKE!!
nandita – Anita Burgholzer & Andreas Hübl –
aus Steyr, Oberösterreich. Ein „ganz
gewöhnliches“ Reiseradlerpaar mit oftmals verrückten Ideen. „Frau nandita“
ist 34 Jahre alt, „Herr nandita“ zählt 39 Lenze. Seit dreizehn
Jahren ein Paar, das immer schon gerne loszog, um die Welt hautnah zu entdecken.Die gemeinsame Passion von Anita & Andreas ist das Reisen mit dem Fahrrad. Was 2007 mit
einer vierwöchigen „Probetour“ durch den Jemen begann, fand zwischen Mai 2010
und September 2012 seinen Höhepunkt: Eine Fahrradweltreise,
die sie und ihre Drahtesel in 844 Tagen auf knapp 36.500 Kilometer durch drei
Kontinente und 35 Länder bringen sollte. Dieser einzigartige Roadtrip prägte
das Leben der beiden nachhaltig, es war ihr Einstieg in die professionelle Vortragsreferenten-Szene.Mit ihrer zweifach prämierten
Live-Reportage „Rückenwind – Mit dem Rad um die Welt“ touren Anita &
Andreas seit Herbst 2013 sehr erfolgreich durch Österreich und Deutschland. Das gleichnamige Buch  erschien mittlerweile in der 3.
Auflage. Regelmäßige Veröffentlichungen in renommierten Tageszeitungen und
Magazinen (SportAktiv, Sonntags-Krone, Salzburger Nachrichten, OÖN, RAUS! …),
sowie Auftritte in Radio und TV (Ö1, ORF2, div. Regionale Radiosender) „runden“
das Portfolio ab.
Anita
Burgholzer, geboren 1980.
Ganz im Ernst aber auch für jeden Spaß zu haben.  “Kreativer” Part von nandita und auch der
weibliche. Anita hat ihr kreatives Händchen in renommierten Werbeagenturen
bewiesen und ist seit einigen Jahren als Grafikdesignerin selbstständig. Nebenbei
tourt sie gemeinsam mit Andreas als Vortragsreferentin durch Österreich und
Deutschland. Sie liebt die Natur und isst für ihr Leben
gerne Pommes.


Andreas
Hübl, geboren 1976.
Männlich, schnell, Kilometerfräse. Zuständig für Organisation, Presse &
Technik. Andreas hat nach mehrjähriger Wirtschaftstätigkeit seinem Dasein als
Einkäufer Lebewohl gesagt. Im Sommer arbeitet  er als Mountainbike-Guide, im Winter hält er gemeinsam mit Anita Vorträge,
kümmert sich um die Vermarktung des Buchs und tüftelt an neuen Projekten. Er
hat die unglaubliche Fähigkeit, trotz seines geringen Kampfgewichts von 69 Kilo
Unmengen an Essbarem in sich hineinzustopfen.
Was
ist Crowdfunding?
Die genaue Übersetzung würde
„Schwarmfinanzierung“ heißen. Statt eines einzelnen Geldgebers tragen viele zur
Finanzierung eines Projekts oder Produkts bei: die Crowd, eine Masse von
Leuten. Der Unterschied zu einer normalen Spendenaktion ist aber, dass Du eine Gegenleistung für Deinen Beitrag
bekommst. Du bezahlst sozusagen per Vorauskassa für ein Dankeschön Deiner Wahl
– und das finden wir super!
Wie
funktioniert der Spendenprozess?
Das Spenden ist in 3 einfache Schritte gegliedert. Zuerst
wählst Du auf der Hauptseite unserer Kampagne Dein Dankeschön (im Fachjargon
heißt das „Perk“) aus. In Schritt 1
hast Du die (optionale) Möglichkeit, einen zusätzlichen Betrag als Geschenk
festzulegen. Darunter kannst Du ein Häkchen setzen, wenn Dein Name nicht auf
der Kampagnenseite gezeigt werden soll. Unterhalb des Pflichtfelds für eine
E-Mail Adresse gibst Du Deine Adresse an, an die wir nach erfolgreicher
Kampagne Dein Dankeschön versenden werden. In Schritt 2 geht’s zur Bezahlung via Paypal bzw. Kreditkarte und in Schritt 3 hast Du die Möglichkeit,
unsere Kampagne via Facebook etc. zu teilen.Wie
funktioniert der Bezahlprozess?
Bei Indiegogo gibt es nur die
Möglichkeit, mit Paypal oder Kreditkarte
zu bezahlen. Auch Kreditkartenzahlungen werden von Paypal abgewickelt, einen
Account bei Paypal brauchst Du dafür aber nicht. Das heißt: Am Ende des
Spendenprozesses kannst Du dich entweder bei Paypal einloggen oder direkt Deine
Kreditkartennummer eingeben. Diese Daten bekommt nur Paypal, sie werden nicht
an uns oder Indiegogo weitergereicht. Paypal bestätigt uns lediglich den
Zahlungseingang. Keine Kreditkarte?
Bitte einfach den nächsten Punkt lesen!

Kann
ich euer tolles Projekt auch ohne Kreditkarte oder PayPal unterstützen?
Falls Du keine Kreditkarte besitzt und
/oder uns lieber per Überweisung unterstützen möchtest, kannst Du den
Wunschbetrag gerne an folgendes Konto überweisen: nandita / Reisen & Live-Reportagen OG, Wehrgrabengasse 85b/1, 4400 Steyr. IBAN: AT191511000921181350, BIC: OBKLAT2L
Bitte vergiss nicht, uns Deinen Namen,
Deine E-Mail Adresse und das gewünschte Dankeschön mitzuteilen. Wir werden Deinen
Betrag dann „manuell“ bei Indiegogo einpflegen und, falls von dir gewünscht,
dich in der Unterstützer-Liste eintragen.

Wie
sicher sind meine Daten?
Die Verbindung mit Indiegogo ist
verschlüsselt, ebenso die Verbindung zu Paypal. Du kannst einstellen, welche
Daten über Deine Spende öffentlich angezeigt werden sollen.***************************   ENGLISH SUMMARY   **************************

story:
Magnetic Molle System is quicker and easier than any other modular and molle system. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1) Compression Strap

Compression straps can be used to carry various things such as mats/blankets/tripods according to your needs.

 

2) Mag. Chest Strap

It can be attached and detached quickly with the magnetic buckle and can be adjusted up and down to fit your body.

 

 

3) Quick Hanging Strap

With one touch, you can put on the hat, jacket, or headphone. 

 

 

 

4) Quick Release Shoulder Strap

No more putting down the bag. It helps you easily and quickly take out items in the bag with Quick Release Shoulder Strap 

 

 

5) Weight Balance Strap

Adjust the Weight Balance Strap to reduce the weight pressure on the shoulders.

 

 

6) Shoulder-Strap-Organizing Strap

No more dangling straps and you can carry a business bag style that you carry easily in one hand.

 

 

7) Holding Buckle Strap can hold a tripod, trekking poles, long stick umbrella, and shoes for better outdoor activity.

 

 

 

 

 

1) Magnetic Buckle is easy to attach and detach but not weak. It can endure to 30KG Pressure

2) Weather-resistant material protects your most expensive and important e-devices.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

L Pouch 2.0 is the perfect pouch for storing everything in a small volume when traveling and in everyday life. Simple design and practicality help users to utilize the space as much as possible.

 

 

i Pouch 2.0 is a pouch that can store and charge mobile phones at the same time.

 

 

RFID BP Pouch 2.0 is an anti-skimming passport pouch that can protect passport, credit card, wallet, and important items from electronic pickpockets, snatchers, and scammers.

 

 

S Pouch 2.0 is a pouch that can protect fragile equipment like camera or camera gears. 

 

 

The Modular Belt 2.0 uniformly distributes the weight of the backpack to the waist. And valuables like passport and valuables can be stored and protected with zippered pockets and security lock hooks.

 

 

 

Luggage & Rain Cover is a multipurpose cover which can be used as a luggage cover and rain cover.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ESHENA, the name comes from the Korean Army ASHENA troops in Afghanistan. ASHENA means "friends" and "colleagues" in Afghan language. Our products are inspired by the military gear we used in Afghanistan, and designed with our own molle system(magnetic) for travel and city lifestyle.

 

PRODUCT WARRANTY

We guarantee the quality and performance for the practical LIFETIME of our products.

This warranty does not cover damage caused by accident, improper care, negligence, normal wear and tear, or the natural breakdown of colors and materials over extended time and use. 

Products are warranted to the original owner against manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship for the practical lifetime of the product. If a product covered by this warranty fails due to a manufacturing defect we will repair the product, without charge, or replace it, at our discretion. If the product is exchanged, the replacement product becomes your property and the product returned becomes ESHENA's property. Only original, unaltered and unmodified materials and workmanship are covered by this policy. This warranty does not cover damage caused by accident, improper care, negligence, normal wear and tear, or the natural breakdown of colors and materials over extended time and use. 

 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

Your order may be subject to import duties and taxes, which are levied once a shipment reaches your country. You will be responsible for paying additional charges for customs clearance; we have no control over these charges and cannot predict what they may be. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; please contact your local customs office for further information. Additionally, when ordering from us, you are the importer and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. You authorize us to designate a carrier to act as your agent with the relevant customs and tax authorities in the destination country, to clear your merchandise and advance (on your behalf) any duties and taxes owed by you. If you don't receive your product in the days, please contact customs office in your country. Shipment may take longer due to the customs inspection. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

With one touch, you can put on the hat, jacket, or headphone. 


 
 
 
4) Quick Release Shoulder Strap
No more putting down the bag. It helps you easily and quickly take out items in the bag with Quick Release Shoulder Strap 

 
 
5) Weight Balance Strap
Adjust the Weight Balance Strap to reduce the weight pressure on the shoulders.
 
 
6) Shoulder-Strap-Organizing Strap
No more dangling straps and you can carry a business bag style that you carry easily in one hand.

 
 
7) Holding Buckle Strap can hold a tripod, trekking poles, long stick umbrella, and shoes for better outdoor activity.


 
 


 
 
 

1) Magnetic Buckle is easy to attach and detach but not weak. It can endure to 30KG Pressure
2) Weather-resistant material protects your most expensive and important e-devices.
 
 
 


 
 


 
 

L Pouch 2.0 is the perfect pouch for storing everything in a small volume when traveling and in everyday life. Simple design and practicality help users to utilize the space as much as possible.

 
 

i Pouch 2.0 is a pouch that can store and charge mobile phones at the same time.



 
 

RFID BP Pouch 2.0 is an anti-skimming passport pouch that can protect passport, credit card, wallet, and important items from electronic pickpockets, snatchers, and scammers.

 
 

S Pouch 2.0 is a pouch that can protect fragile equipment like camera or camera gears. 

 
 

The Modular Belt 2.0 uniformly distributes the weight of the backpack to the waist. And valuables like passport and valuables can be stored and protected with zippered pockets and security lock hooks.



 
 
 

Luggage & Rain Cover is a multipurpose cover which can be used as a luggage cover and rain cover.

 
 
 


 
 
 


 
 
 


 
 
 
 


 
 
 


 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 


ESHENA, the name comes from the Korean Army ASHENA troops in Afghanistan. ASHENA means "friends" and "colleagues" in Afghan language. Our products are inspired by the military gear we used in Afghanistan, and designed with our own molle system(magnetic) for travel and city lifestyle.
 
PRODUCT WARRANTY
We guarantee the quality and performance for the practical LIFETIME of our products.
This warranty does not cover damage caused by accident, improper care, negligence, normal wear and tear, or the natural breakdown of colors and materials over extended time and use. 
Products are warranted to the original owner against manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship for the practical lifetime of the product. If a product covered by this warranty fails due to a manufacturing defect we will repair the product, without charge, or replace it, at our discretion. If the product is exchanged, the replacement product becomes your property and the product returned becomes ESHENA's property. Only original, unaltered and unmodified materials and workmanship are covered by this policy. This warranty does not cover damage caused by accident, improper care, negligence, normal wear and tear, or the natural breakdown of colors and materials over extended time and use.  CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION
Your order may be subject to import duties and taxes, which are levied once a shipment reaches your country. You will be responsible for paying additional charges for customs clearance; we have no control over these charges and cannot predict what they may be. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; please contact your local customs office for further information. Additionally, when ordering from us, you are the importer and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. You authorize us to designate a carrier to act as your agent with the relevant customs and tax authorities in the destination country, to clear your merchandise and advance (on your behalf) any duties and taxes owed by you. If you don't receive your product in the days, please contact customs office in your country. Shipment may take longer due to the customs inspection. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Short Summary
Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

Introduce yourself and your background.
Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:

Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.


The Impact
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
Make it real for people and build trust.


Risks & Challenges
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
Describe your plan for solving these challenges.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Firekorf a portable lightweight / all-in-one firepit!

 The Firekorf is first of all a very unique fire pit. It is designed to be portable and lightweight but still with the focus on experiencing the fire, safety and durability.

With the special features we have designed for the Firekorf it is more than just a fire pit. It makes the Firekorf perfect for cooking outdoors and to enjoy it with friends and family.

What makes the Firekorf special?

  1.  The Fire bag keeps the fire safe from the wind while at the same time providing oxygen to the fire and radiating out its heat.
  2.  The Frame is strong and lightweight but still folds down very compact.
  3.  The cooking features specially designed for the Firekorf. Also with the focus on quality and portability.

Except for the handle of the spit which is made out of walnut wood. All the parts and features of the Firekorf are made out of 304 stainless steel. This makes them very durable and with some clever design we also managed to keep it potable and light. 

Firepit design

  •  Frame 

The frame of the Firekorf is built up out of 4 foldable legs that on their turn can be folded to make the frame as compact as possible. Being completely made out of 304 Stainless steel they are very durable and because of the designed shape of the legs it is possible to make them out of very thin steel plate with out losing too much structural integrity.

On the top part of the frame there are hooks to secure the firebag and on the very top mounting points to connect the grill and the roasting spit to the frame.

  •  Firebag 

The bag that hangs between the legs of the frame is made out of 304 stainless steel wire mesh. This is like a fabric, woven out of very thin stainless steel wires. It is very strong and durable against the heat of the fire and ideal for this portable fire pit, because it is also flexible and much lighter than regular steel plate.

The wire mesh makes the fire burn better because more oxygen can get to the fire and lets you enjoy the fire better as the heat of the fire can radiate out.

Cooking features 

  • Grill

Grill rolled up:

The grill we designed for the Firekorf also needed to be compact, strong and light. This grill is also made out of food save 304 stainless steel. It is strong  and easy to clean.

We made the grill out of steel rods that are connected on both side by a steel wire. This makes a flexible grill that can be rolled up. To make the grill a strong solid surface, there are two steel rods that connect to the grill and follow the length of the steel wires on each side of the grill. 

The grill connects in to the holes on top of the frame to make one solid structure. We have tested the grill and the frame up to 10kg without any problems.

  • Roasting spit

The roasting spit makes the outdoor cooking experience complete! The spit is made specially for the Firekorf. It is also designed to compact and lightweight. The spit itself is made out of 3 parts that screw together into one long spit. This spit fits on the Firekorf with 2 brackets that screw into the legs of the Firekorf.

On the point side, the spit and its bracket are round so it can turn easy. On the side of the handle the rod of the spit and the bracket are square which makes it possible to lock it in place so the spit can't turn further of back.

Specs and materials

  • Compact storing

 

All parts of the Firekorf and its features  are designed so that they can be folded, rolled up or screwed together. Although it is large, it can be packed very compact.

Every part has its on place in the roll-up cover bag. This cover bag is specially design for the firekorf and makes it very easy and compact to store or carry. Even if your are not planning to take all the accessories with you.

  •  Durabel materials 

All the parts and features of the Firekorf are made out of 304 stainless steel. Except for the handle of the spit which is made out of walnut wood. This makes it a high quality and durable product.  

The 304 stainless steel is food save and easy to clean and maintain. 

  •  Weight and dimensions

story:
​

A year ago, we unveiled the original Zenbivy Bed. For the first time a person could sleep in every position, regulate temperature, and sleep in total comfort, in the middle of nowhere. The bed took off and before we knew it people from all over the world were beginning to sing it's praises. From reviews, to magazines, social media buzz, etc. people were agreeing with our assessment that the Zenbivy Bed truly was the most comfortable backcountry sleeping bag ever designed.  

But ever since we launched it, people have been asking for an “ultralight” version. Something that could pack even lighter than the original and compete with the lightest blankets and mummy bags on the market. So we thought, lets do it! 

We went back to the drawing board, removed the zippers, replaced them with an incredibly versatile hook and loop system, upgraded the fabrication with new materials and 800 fill power down, and BAM! the Zenbivy Light Bed was born—the most comfortable and versatile ultralight sleep system ever designed. 

 

The Zenbivy Light Bed's patent-pending zipper-less design ranks it with the lightest quilts and mummies on the market. But unlike those products, it's comfortable... really comfortable. Why? Because you can sleep in any position, with covers tucked or untucked—letting you effortlessly regulate your nightly temperature.

The Zenbivy Bed is the world's first two-piece sleeping bag. But you can't really call it that. Bags don't let people sleep in their favorite positions. Bags slide off the mattress.  Bags get twisted when you roll around in them.  Bags are only one size (some are warm but small, some are big but cold). With Zenbivy, you don't slide off the mattress.  You cover it with a soft sheet and lie on it, just like at home.  The separate quilt "floats" even when zipped in, so it won't twist around you,  pin you,  or trap you. The quilt can be "tucked in" for cold weather or "untucked" for warm. The hood gives you a snug place for your head and arms, with the quilt tucked in as snugly as you want.  All without constricting your head and neck with a bag's web of cords and toggles.

The hinges expand and contract with your movements, allowing you to move freely under the quilt—just like your bed at home.

Did you know it's impossible for a quarter of us to achieve our natural sleep position in a mummy bag? All Zenbivy Beds are designed to allow natural sleep and effortless transitions between the 6 most common sleep positions.  So whether you're a Fetus sleeper (41%), or a Log (15%), Yearner (13%), Soldier (8%), Freefall (7%) or Starfish (5%), you can sleep however you want in a Zenbivy Bed--just like your bed at home.

 

 

Ultralighters have long favored quilts for their light weight, versatility and comfort. But quilts alone are not a perfect or total solution. So ultra-lighters have adapted various methods to address a quilt's lack of head insulation and tendency to fall off the mattress. But these "fixes" (strap systems, jacket hoods and other contraptions) usually detract significantly from a quilt's comfort benefits. All Zenbivy Beds incorporate the quilt in a way that allows for natural sleep, while making it as thermally efficient as a mummy bag. So while quilts may have been invented for backpacking, a Zenbivy Bed makes them perfect for everything.

 

Available as either a complete Zenbivy Light Bed or for the first time ever, we are offering just the Zenbivy Light Quilt. EN rated to 23º F, this is our most versatile build for full 3-season protection. Legitimately light enough for extreme adventures, with all the comfort you’ve come to know and expect from Zenbivy.

 

Available as either a complete Zenbivy Light Bed or for the first time ever, we are offering just the Zenbivy Light Quilt. EN limit rated to 10º F (target), this is our most versatile build for extended 3-season protection and cold sleepers. Legitimately light enough for extreme adventures, with all the comfort you’ve come to know and expect from Zenbivy.

 

Both the 10º and 25º quilts use a premium 800 fill power HyperDRY™ fluorocarbon-free water-resistant down from Allied.  Not only is it the best down you can buy, but it’s sourced according to RDS standards (Responsible Down Standard).

Conventional wisdom would have us believe that synthetic insulations outperform down in wet conditions.  But in this case conventional wisdom happens to be wrong. While it’s true synthetics will insulate better than down when wet, its also true synthetics soak up water, while down is naturally hydrophobic.  It's simply much harder to get a down bag wet. And with the recent invention of water-resistant down, it's truer than ever.

Materials

Down: 800 fill-power HyperDRY™ fluorocarbon free water-resistant 90/10 duck down

Shell and Liner: 20d Nylon Taffeta, coating-free, 380T, cire, fluorocarbon-free DWR, 36g/m2

Zippers: N/A

Clips: Nifco HND5L

The days for using a rolled up shirt or jacket as your pillow are over.  Our new Zenbivy Light Pillow’s 2-Piece design is not only one of the lightest pillows on the market, but it’s by far the most comfortable and the only one built like your bed at home. The key to the Light Pillow’s amazing comfort can be found in its 2-piece design. The pongee pillow cover that slips over the bladder is not only incredibly soft and comfortable, but it allows you to:

 

 

 
 

Below is a list of Light Bed Indiegogo Perks. The Perks are broken down by temprature rating (10º & 25º) and by size (Regular, Large and XL).

Note: We are having you select the size and color you want after you have purchased your perk.

We will notify you within 2 business days with a BIG Thank You! for supporting our campaign and instructions.

story:
Has it ever happened to you?

Found yourself trying to converse in a different language, only to attempt the use of phrase books and travel guides, becoming more confused in the process.

This will become a thing of the past, as LeTrans bridges the communications gap with flair.

Here's how...

Recently featured in

How can this be possible... 97%?... Well, its really down to many factors such as noise, signal strength, as well as the accent and dialect of speech. But in the development of our algorithms, we peaked at a 97% voice understanding and translation with common sentence structures.

To put simply, the translation is as good as we can make it, and will only get better as the database and algorithms develop.

 

Ergonomically designed, great to hold and solid to use. Created with the user in mind so that it signifies a level of quality and assurance.

 

The ability to split into two nodes, to offer features such as sharing with friends, setting up conference meetings, or just conversing with strangers.

What's more, there is no need to share any earpieces!

 

Our dedicated APP is needed to change settings, but LeTrans can be used independently, due to the additions of WiFi and 4G SIM support.

 

Pairing upto 10 devices through Bluetooth will allow for conferencing mode, where each device will translate in its own language in real-time.

 
Conference mode in action
 

 

Note: The Conference Mode video demonstrates multi-language translation at once per device, to simulate a meeting environment. LeTrans would normally be held to your ear in such an environment so that translations are clear.
 

LeTrans not only connects to our Smart APP to access settings and language options, but can also use WiFi or its own 4G SIM support to access our dedicated cloud servers for direct translation, without the need for your phone.

Our unique language algorithms then access the database, responding with the corresponding translation in real-time.

 

 

 

 

LeTrans currently supports 24 languages, but more are coming! Let us know which languages you wish to be added in the comments.

 

 

In-depth Product Specifications can either be seen as utterly boring or incredibly fascinating, depending on your interests.

Either way, here they are...

 

The typical LeTrans package comes with the LeTrans translation device itself, a charge cable and adapter, a manual, a warranty card, a very cool box, and a nifty travel bag!

The LeTrans pack in all its glory!

 

So take a look and be sure to act early to get our discount deals while they last!

We have had a great response in many events, and won this years Analyst's Choice award at the Global Sources event in Hong Kong!

  • Do I have to split it to 2 devices to operate?

No. You can use it as one solid unit if you like with no issue, only needed to split into two if you have the need to share with others so they can directly translate their own voice.

  • How long do the batteries last before they need charging?

Continuous use, LeTrans can work from around 2.5-3 hours. Passive use, LeTrans can last for up to 12 hours before requiring a charge.

  • Can it really do 97% accuracy?

    In the right environment, our database can offer a high 97% ratio on translations. This of course does depend on your surroundings and how clear you speak, but on average with normal use LeTrans works perfectly well. Please remember that strong accents and dialects could result in mis-translations.

    It is a learning database, so the fact is the more you use it, the better it will get!

  • My native language isn’t on the list, will more be added?

    Many languages are due to be added after the launch as the database and need grows. The additions will be part of the database and APP updates so look for them and let us know what languages you need added.

  • Do I need my smartphone to use it?

    Your smart device runs the APP, and the APP changes settings you may need on LeTrans. The APP also runs translations of images and text. LeTrans can run by itself without the APP via its WiFi connection or its 4G SIM support, which allows it to connect directly to the cloud servers and database without the need for a smart device.

  • Does LeTrans come with a warranty?

Each LeTrans unit comes with a 1 year warranty. Fill in the warranty card included when you receive your item, or register via our website online, and you will be covered for a year in-case LeTrans has any issues.

  • When will the product be ready to ship?​

We are working to cover all the basis and be ready by April. We do not want to promise fast delivery and fall into the trap as others have done beforehand. This is why, with the framework we are putting in place which includes materials, logistics, customs, manufacturing etc... we are confident that April 2018 is our realistic goal for distribution.

  • What are the delivery fees around the world?

Free. That's right, free delivery to all countries is included in the purchase price, no matter what set you choose. Enjoy!

LeTrans would normally be held to your ear in such an environment so that translations are clear. LeTrans not only connects to our Smart APP to access settings and language options, but can also use WiFi or its own 4G SIM support to access our dedicated cloud servers for direct translation, without the need for your phone.Our unique language algorithms then access the database, responding with the corresponding translation in real-time.    LeTrans currently supports 24 languages, but more are coming! Let us know which languages you wish to be added in the comments.  In-depth Product Specifications can either be seen as utterly boring or incredibly fascinating, depending on your interests.Either way, here they are... The typical LeTrans package comes with the LeTrans translation device itself, a charge cable and adapter, a manual, a warranty card, a very cool box, and a nifty travel bag!The LeTrans pack in all its glory! So take a look and be sure to act early to get our discount deals while they last!We have had a great response in many events, and won this years Analyst's Choice award at the Global Sources event in Hong Kong!Do I have to split it to 2 devices to operate?No. You can use it as one solid unit if you like with no issue, only needed to split into two if you have the need to share with others so they can directly translate their own voice.How long do the batteries last before they need charging?Continuous use, LeTrans can work from around 2.5-3 hours. Passive use, LeTrans can last for up to 12 hours before requiring a charge.

Can it really do 97% accuracy?
In the right environment, our database can offer a high 97% ratio on translations. This of course does depend on your surroundings and how clear you speak, but on average with normal use LeTrans works perfectly well. Please remember that strong accents and dialects could result in mis-translations.
It is a learning database, so the fact is the more you use it, the better it will get!


My native language isn’t on the list, will more be added?
Many languages are due to be added after the launch as the database and need grows. The additions will be part of the database and APP updates so look for them and let us know what languages you need added.


Do I need my smartphone to use it?
Your smart device runs the APP, and the APP changes settings you may need on LeTrans. The APP also runs translations of images and text. LeTrans can run by itself without the APP via its WiFi connection or its 4G SIM support, which allows it to connect directly to the cloud servers and database without the need for a smart device.

Does LeTrans come with a warranty?
Each LeTrans unit comes with a 1 year warranty. Fill in the warranty card included when you receive your item, or register via our website online, and you will be covered for a year in-case LeTrans has any issues.When will the product be ready to ship?​We are working to cover all the basis and be ready by April. We do not want to promise fast delivery and fall into the trap as others have done beforehand. This is why, with the framework we are putting in place which includes materials, logistics, customs, manufacturing etc... we are confident that April 2018 is our realistic goal for distribution.What are the delivery fees around the world?Free. That's right, free delivery to all countries is included in the purchase price, no matter what set you choose. Enjoy!

story:
When on a business trip, are you very tired of carrying a heavy suitcase when you are exhausted? We also feel tired of this, so in the past two years, we have created a revolutionary scooter suitcase. Innovatively combine the skateboard with the trunk, Iubest Pro Scooter, no more bulky luggage, makes it easier and more convenient for you to travel.

The price of one Iubest Pro is equal to eight time transportation expenses. No more traffic jam. Iubest Pro puts a spin on your commute.

The Iubest Pro Scooter is a multifunctional scooter, which is the ideal accompaniment on your private or business travels. This innovative lubest scooter/folding suitcase combo is flexible enough to deal with various traffic conditions, allowing users to control their speed as needed. With Iubest Pro, users are able to create many unique memories and look forward to hanging out with Iubest Pro for many years to come.

Solid Three-section Handle: Our Iubest Pro suitcase comes equipped with a user-friendly three-section telescoping handle that can be adjusted to align with the user’s height. The framework is also made from an ultra-thick all aluminum alloy for enhanced strength and durability.

With one press of a button, the three- second folding action opens or closes, assuring the ultimate in Iubest Pro stability and convenience. With the one-touch folding system, users can easily pull Iubest Pro behind them and carry their packed suitcase onto any flight. This innovative design can also be easily stored in the small spaces such as those found in an aircraft cabin.

The total weight of Iubest Pro is just 9.73 kg and the size of the hard suitcase is 20 inches in length. This intelligent design is light and easy to carry during trips and while commuting. In addition, Iubest Pro meets most airline's shipping requirements. It is able to transform into carry-on baggage in seconds so users can take it everywhere they go.

Double security measures protect your luggage, allowing users to set passwords for daily use to protect their luggage. During an airport inspection there is also no need to open the luggage with a password as customs officials can open the suitcase by using customized keys, avoiding the necessity for a rough luggage inspection.

The lubest Pro Scooter maintains excellent running stability. In addition, the 100 W brushless motor offers the ultimate cycling experience as it provides powerful torque, with a maximum speed of 15 km/h (approximately 9.3 mph). Make your commutes more interesting and convenient with the lubest Pro Scooter today.

With unique and improved double-wishbone suspension and tricycle frame

Iubest Pro Scooter automatically increases forward power and enhances the stability of the entire vehicle when riding on a slope of less than 15 degrees or navigating past small obstacles. This stability allows for a much smoother cycling experience than earlier technology.

Our team designed the Iubest Pro Scooter with a removable luggage carrier, which can be transformed into a cool electric scooter in a short three seconds. You can do whatever you want with Iubest Pro Scooter. DO IT YOUR WAY!

The Iubest Pro Scooter has adopted a thumb throttle speed control and dual brake system in conjunction with the safest double-wishbone suspension and tricycle frame to protect you from danger. Also, Iubest Pro is equipped with non-slip grips and Polyurethane wheels, which can sustain a maximum weight of 120 kg (240 lbs.) and provides users with a safe, convenient transport experience whenever needed.

 

The Iubest Pro Scooter contains built-in Bluetooth, which can be connected to the mobile app. When the scooter and the phone are separated by more than the prescribed distance (less than 30 m), the app will automatically alert the user to prevent the Iubest Scooter from being lost.

Removable battery for use as an emergency power source. A battery with a capacity of 5.2 Ah meets the shipping requirements of most airlines. What’s more, with the USB charging port, users can charge their phones and iPads anytime, anywhere.

While most scooters on the market offer chargers, which perform a single battery charge in approximately 5 hours, at Iubest we believe that recharging as fast as possible is key to completing your daily journey. That's why our Scooter battery charge can be completed in a short, 2.5 hours.

Equipped with a Samsung21700 Lithium-ion battery and advanced technology, Iubest Pro assures users of traveling safety and efficiency.

 

The use of a lightweight ABS material promotes the durability of the Iubest Pro, makes it more flexible than other suitcases and the dense material promotes longevity of this unique product. The glossy finish is extremely scratch-resistant, maintaining the new look of your suitcases no matter how much rough handling it is subjected to.

Reasonable Partition Design: Fully lined, the luggage protects stored items from scratches and snags and includes four separate zippered pockets, which work well for secure storage of smaller items such as important papers, accessories or phone cords and chargers, which helps to keep all your items neatly separated. 

Dear Backers,

Referral Program To Win FREE Packing Kit, PHILPS Electric Toothbrush, GoPro Action Camera and More!!!

To promote the brands to more customers, your valuable share and recommendation will be super help. We’re going to launch the referral program to reward you with great free offers! All you need to do is to back us and share our campaign on Facebook/Twitter/ Instagram/Linkedin, forum, blogs and wherever you can! In order to motivate you to share, we provide these very great free rewards.

If you bring a backer to our campaign, and they pledge more than one Iubest Pro, you will receive one FREE Packing Kit!

The first 10 backers who bring 6 contributions on the IUBEST Pro will get one FREE PHILPS Electric Toothbrush.

The first one to bring 15 contributions on the IUBEST Pro will get one Free GoPro Action Camera.

All successful referrers will be able to join the lottery pool, we will draw one lucky backer from the lottery pool and send the FREE IUBEST Pro. The more you share, the higher chance you will win! It’s super easy to join the referral program!

Method 1:

Simply log in to Indiegogo and visit the IUBEST Pro campaign page:

https://igg.me/at/iubestpro-scooter-suitcase

Find the share button and share directly.

Method 2:

Step 1:

Visit the IUBEST Pro campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video for the "Link" button. 

Step 2:

Click the "Link" button. You will then see a popup with your unique link. Copy your unique share URL and use your unique URL to share the campaign on social media, email your friends and contacts, write a blog article , write a forums post, etc.

To get a free reward with your pledge, you must fulfill all following requirements:

1. Supporters must pledge for a minimum reward of no less than $850.

2. Share our Indiegogo campaign link in a public post.

3. The event is valid from November 15th, 2018 to November 30th, 2018     

Some tips to win 

From our first campaign experience, here are several really helpful tips:

1, Write something interesting, like digital trends article title: “Now, you can go skateboarding to the airport”. that’s really eye-catcher.

2, Share on some good forum and blogs.

Like : https://skateboarding.transworld.net/&http://forums.sidewalkmag.com

If you are playing on those great forums, it is great to share over there. 

3, Share in great facebook/google plus groups. There are many great facebook and google plus groups, you may consider also share in those group. We found several referral program free winners, they shared our campaign in some large kickstarter and Indiegogo crowdfunding facebook groups, and some skateboarding facebook groups.

4, Paste that link to anywhere with large viewership, like your emails, facebook groups, Linkedin groups, personal blogs, or some forums, anywhere. The more you share, the better your chance to win.

Cheers!

IUBEST Team

About Shipping

1. Does it ship internationally?

Yes, Iubest Pro can be shipped worldwide. Please note that the import restrictions will vary depending on the country. If there is any problem with the custom and tariff costs, please help us to solve the problem. It is difficult to ship to island countries and the tariff costs must be covered by the customer, so please think twice before you back this product.

 
2. Does the listed price cover shipping and tariff costs?

The listed price only refers to the product itself and shipping costs. Tariff costs is not included and must be covered by the customer. Tariff costs will vary depending on your country. Please note this before you back this product.

 
About Iubest
 
3. What type of battery does Iubest Pro use?

It contains a rechargeable lithium-ion battery.

Battery capacity: 5200mAh

Motor: 100w

 
4. How much does Iubest Pro weigh?

An empty Suitcase: 2.75kg (6.05 lb)

Electric kick scooter: 4.91kg (10.8 lb)

Battery: 650g (1.43 lb)

Total: 9.73kg (21.4 lb)

 
5. How long does it take to fully charge the battery?

It takes 2.5 hours for a full charge.

 
6. What kind of motor does Iubest Pro use?

100W brushless motor

Max. speed:15km/h (9.3mph)

Max. travel distance: 10km (6miles)

Max. incline: 15°

Max. load:120kg (264lb)

(※The above information may vary depending on bag weight and incline level)

 
7. What is Iubest Pro top speed?

The e-Luggage can reach a maximum speed of 15km/h (9.3 mph).

 
8. What type of wheels does Iubest Pro use?

The front wheel is 5-inch Polyurethane (PU) tire. The rear wheel is 3-inch tires that provide core support for the kick scooter.

 
9. What type of brakes does Iubest Pro use?

Iubest Pro is equipped with a dual-brake system, which one thereof is the power brake and the other a manual brake. The manual brake is placed on the rear of the kick scooter and can be used to quickly halt the device.

 
10. Can Iubest Pro be ridden on all surfaces?

It is recommended to use Iubest Pro on flat surfaces. Grass and sand are surfaces that Iubest Pro is not specifically designed for use on.

 
12. Can Iubest Pro be brought on all domestic and international flights?

Iubest Pro and its battery have been designed to fit under general airline restrictions. Please note that certain airlines may have individual restrictions. The hard suitcase is removable and can be carried on with you on the plane.
