story:
Resumo

Eu quero ir mais longe! Como fotógrafo de viagem e aventura tenho sentido a necessidade de explorar mais, e por vezes só as pernas não chegam. Existem tantos sítios onde um carro ainda não chega. Por isso decidi voltar ao meio de transporte que sempre me deu tantas alegrias: a bicicleta!

Venho pedir a vossa ajuda para este projecto que é levar-me a conhecer, fotografar e partilhar sítios novos e mais recônditos. Já tenho algumas ideias, mas falta-me o mais importante, a bicicleta que me permita ir mais longe e melhor. Ao contribuírem, não só estarão a colocar um sorriso na minha cara, mas também a ter acesso a uma série de produtos e serviços, relacionados com fotografia e afins, fornecidos por mim.

Espero poder contar com todos vós!

 

 

Sobre mim

Olá! O meu nome é David Pires, nasci nos anos 90 e sou um algarvio a viver na bela cidade de Lisboa. Muito do meu tempo é passado a fotografar (e por vezes faço uns vídeos) com principal foco em viagem, aventura e lifestyle. O resto do tempo é passado com a Maria e o meu filho, o Xavier, em aventuras na natureza, a ler ou a fazer uns petiscos para partilhar com quem mais gosto. 

 

O que eu preciso

Para conseguir avançar sobre rodas por esse mundo fora preciso, no mínimo, de €1650. Com isso e alguns extras poderei avançar com a compra de:

  • Bicicleta Gravel;
  • Sapatos de ciclismo;
  • Saco de selim e quadro;
  • Roupa extra;
  • Taxa IndieGogo.

 

O que dou em troca

Como não estou aqui só para pedir, vou querer, de alguma forma, devolver algo a quem me apoie. A melhor maneira que encontro para o fazer é fornecer os meus produtos e serviços. Na lista de Perks podem ver com mais detalhe tudo o que tenho ao dispor: desde prints (em várias dimensões) a sessões fotográficas, bem como presets de edição, ou até mesmo workshops privados de fotografia. Também podem contribuir sem querer nada em troca, ou até ter uma outra sugestão de algo que eu possa oferecer (babysitting, passear o cão, fotografar um casamento, ir ao IKEA comprar almôndegas, entre outros) e podemos falar sobre isso :)

 

O impacto

Tenho sempre várias ideias e projectos na cabeça. Muitos deles são sobre como posso aproveitar melhor a natureza, como posso criar aventuras diferentes, como posso ir a sítios novos. Ter uma bicicleta que seja capaz de enfrentar caminhos menos explorados, estradas terciárias e quilómetros sinuosos é uma das respostas a essas necessidades.
Vou poder criar, mostrar e partilhar novas formas de aventura e natureza enquanto me mantenho em forma e faço o melhor possível para respeitar o nosso planeta!

 

 

Outras maneiras de ajudar

Se não puderem/quiserem contribuir monetariamente, podem sempre apoiar esta campanha de outras maneiras:

  • Partilhar este projecto com alguém que possa ter interesse em apoiar;
  • Usarem as vossas redes sociais para que esta campanha chegue a mais pessoas;
  • Seguindo e apoiando o meu trabalho através do meu Instagram ou o meu site;
  • Pensarem em mim em próximos projectos criativos!

SOLAR  PUMP®: HOT WATER FROM SOLAR ENERGY FOR LESS THAN THE CHEAPEST FOSSIL FUELS!



Our Solar Pump® generator is a disruptive innovation in the renewable energy industry. Our unique system provides at a very low price hot water from solar energy. Our cost structure is low because our Solar Pump® power station technology delivers the energy of the future as soon as today: local solar energy available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year without intermittences.

According to academic research and industry survey, transporting energy from distant power plants represents up to 40% of energy total price. The energy produced by our Solar Pump® power stations is free of transport costs because the generators are located on clients’ sites: hotels, schools, hospitals, condos and soon private houses. They form an integral part of the buildings and are only dedicated to them.

This operational and energetic proximity explains why our price for each kWh is lower than our competitors – whether they operate in the renewable (photovoltaic, wind, wood, etc.), nuclear or fossil fuel industry.  

Lutexia - Cost comparison of useful kWh of energies available on the Energy Market VS our Solar Pump® power station


YOU DON'T PAY THE SOLAR PUMP® ITSELF (WE DO), JUST THE HOT WATER!

We finance and build the whole local power station in your building – on the roof and in your boiler room – or near of it but we keep the ownership. You don’t have to pay any rent. You just have to pay the hot water produced by the station at the lowest price ever seen.


WHY DO WE NEED FUNDING?

We need funding to build by March 2017 the first 100% US Solar Pump® system. Once the system built, we can install it in a first collective building in Florida in May 2017 and start our green business in the United States. Just remember that our future clients don't have to pay the Solar Pump® system, they only pay the hot water produced by the system.  


OUR UNIQUE AND SUCCESSFUL TECHNOLOGY:
THE SOLAR PUMP® GENERATOR

Based on a combination of the different types of Solar Pump® collectors and the various ways they can be integrated, the Solar Pump® system is an ecological and economical alternative to gas and other fossil fuels. With the great productivity of its solar collectors and its thermodynamic heart, the Solar Pump® generates a higher net energy balance than the other renewable power plants and is the world's most efficient solar water heater. 

With Solar Pump® systems, we deliver a  100% renewable energy hot water for less than hot water produced by the cheapest known energy (which is gas - a fossil fuel by the way) and with no release of CO2 into the atmosphere.

The Solar Pump® system combines a heat pump and a solar collector. The solar collector heats a water loop through sunlight and ambient temperature. Energy from the water loop heated is collected by the Solar Pump®, then transferred to storage balloons or a large aquatic mass such as a swimming pool. Through the solar collector, the Solar Pump® can run all day and night, regardless of weather conditions: sunshine, rain, heat air, condensation,... with outdoor temperatures down to 14°F (-10°C).


WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS OF THE SOLAR PUMP® SYSTEM?

 Cost effectiveness. Compared to most of traditional energy sources, such as fossil fuel, the energy produced by the Solar Pump® system is cheaper and operates highly competitive performance ratios. And you don't have to pay the Solar Pump® system, just the hot water produced by the system!


 Performance capacity. The Solar Pump® system can meet hot water needs of large communities and office buildings, with a production capacity of 400 to 5400 gallons (about 1,500 to 20,000 liters) of hot water a day.

 Simplicity. The Solar Pump® system is easy to maintain, use and install.  With its small size and low weight, a Solar Pump® unity can easily fit into a technical room. The Solar Pump® solar collectors are very light, can be installed vertically or horizontally on the roof and have a very limited architectural impact.


IS IT POSSIBLE TO INTEGRATE A SOLAR PUMP® SYSTEM IN A PRIVATE HOUSE ?

Not yet. We can install local power stations in local communities, schools, hospitals, condos, factories and other collective buildings but not in private houses. We are working on it but we are not ready. It's just a question of time and... money! That's why this crowdfunding campaign is so important for us. With your help, we can stop climate change and leave a greener planet to our children and grandchildren!


However we will send you very soon updates from our ongoing studies and works for the Private House Solar Pump ! We are working on it.


WHAT ABOUT THE TEAM?


YES, WE HAVE REWARDS!

Each and every one of you can back our project. Whatever your financial support, we will be grateful to you and we will thank you with a reward. Every dollar helps us. 

Here are a few samples of what’s in store for you.

The very attractive Lutexia outdoor solar lamp has white light, stainless steel shaft, plastic ground spear, integrated solar panel with rechargeable battery.

Our black solar pocket calculator is eco-friendly. Derived from corn starch, it has a 10 digit display and works solely on solar power.

Our black mug is neat in every sense of the word: simple in design, pleasing in appearance and clever in style. It uses the latest heat-to-reveal technology.

Our digital solar alarm clock is elegant and multifunctional. It is also a calendar and it indicates the temperature.

Our high-quality Lutexia watch with a Japanese movement and a waterproofness of 3 ATM will remind you that our system is 100% green and provide you solar energy 24 hours a day.

With this elegant silver portable solar charger, you can easily charge your smartphone, your tablet or your MP3 player everywhere you go on the spot!  

The Lutexia solar shower is very simple to operate, just hookup to a water supply, and the solar shower will ensure hot water all day long – for FREE - thanks to the sun. 

Simple and easy to install, the Lutexia solar kit for above ground swimming pool is directly connected to the swimming pool external filtering system.

And, for the big backers, we offer them a visit of the Giordano factory, where the Solar Pump® is manufactured, during a fantastic 3 day trip in the beautiful and sunny Provence(South of France). 

We also propose a 8 day travel  in Tunisia. With Marc Giordano, CEO of Lutexia Energy, you will visit the Soften factory (Société Franco-Tunisienne d'Energie Nouvelle), subsidiary of Giordano Industries and solar energy leader in Tunisia.


OTHER WAYS TO HELP

If you can't help financially, don't fret! You can still help us by spreading the word! Share, Tweet, Like and talk about Lutexia Energy and its Solar Pump®  with all your friends. Share the IndieGoGo link with everyone and help us build momentum.

Our Twitter account is @lutexiaenergy

This is one of the greatest ways you can help us if you've donated or not. We urge everyone who believes in Lutexia Energy to do this! 

                                         



RISKS AND CHALLENGES

WHAT ARE THE RISKS?

1. Would the US market accept our local power station?
Offering hot water produced by 100% renewable energy at such a low price is so attractive that some public authorities could be reluctant. Never mind, we are used to fight back.  Moreover, we aim to build in March 2017 a 100% US Solar Pump®. So, why the public authorities would be reluctant to a system which is efficient and can give work to American people?

2. Could lower fossil fuel prices affect our competitiveness?
We remain confident: our prices are lower than the cheapest fossil fuels. Even today, when the fossil fuel prices are lower than ever, the kWh produced by our Solar Pump® system are still less than the kWh produced by oil or gas. 

WHAT ARE THE CHALLENGES?

1. We have to convince potential investors 

We have to convince potential investors to finance our next local power stations. If we can build ourselves our first two local power stations in the United States, we will be able to show that our concept works and attracts potential American investors for the future. But to do so​,​ we need your help through this campaign. 
​ 
2. We have to convince potential customers 
​We have to convince potential customers (hotel owners, senior home managers, school directors,...) that they can save money by using our local power stations. They don't have to pay any rent for this local power station - the building of the power station is entirely supported by Lutexia -, they only pay the hot water produced by the Solar Pump® system. This is why we are confident if you help us.

story:
Featured on BackerClub.co!!
 

We all love having a myriad of everyday-carry (EDC) gear, right?  Man's search for the perfect combination of EDC stems from our roots as cavemen.  "Do I take the trusty wooden club today, or the new high capacity assault sling and bag of pebbles?"  It's a problem that we may never find the absolute perfect solution to.  Well, out of all of the Indiegogo campaigns that you could have navigated to, you came to the right one.  

The ARti tool combines a kick ass design with an arsenal of built-in functions.  100% legal in California and TSA friendly, you can take it wherever you go and be more prepared for life.  Grade 5 titanium construction will endure many of your spur-of-the-moment conundrums.

 

 

 

Many EDC tools are too bulky and awkward, jostling around as an uncomfortable lump in the bottom of your pocket all day...more hassle than they are useful.  Those tend to find a permanent resting place in a drawer.  The ARti tool's tactical pocket hook and keychain holes resolve the issue of where to put it so you won't notice it until you reach for it to save your life.  (or just to open the dang screwed-shut battery hatch of your kid's favorite toy)  The pocket hook is the tip of the iceberg when it comes to the ARti tool's features.  Here's the rundown on the ARti's awesome features:

Features:

 

  • A phillips screwdriver.  Yes, phillips.  Built-in.  Not just a flat-head like all of the others. (not an easy feature to add on the machining side of things)
  • The tactical pocket hook.
  • 2 round key chain holes, spaced 65mm apart which happens to make it a good fit on some popular "swiss army" style key chain tools.  (see pics)
  • A scraper/prybar end.  Scrape AR-15 carbon or make a sandwich! 
  • A sharp-ish point for opening boxes or slashing at a bear during an attack.
  • A nail-puller for when you are demo-ing your daughter's doll house but want to save the materials for your next project.
  • A mil-spec bottle opener.
  • A 1/4" hex wrench or bit driver hole.  And hey, if you want to hang your key ring from this hole I'm not going to tell you how to live your life...
  • A flat-head screwdriver.
  • 3mm thick makes it very strong yet unobtrusive in your pocket.
  • Grade 5 titanium will hold up to use without ever corroding.  It also allows me to offer anodized options.
  • Shaped like America's favorite rifle, which will bring much admiration from your friends and their girlfriends as you pull it out to show them for the first time.

 

 

 

    The ARti tool's Uses:

    This list was deleted by the admin because it was too long.  That. Just. Happened.  Sooooo many uses.... Here are just a few:
     

             

                

       

     

    The Perks:

    Pretty self-explanatory.  ARti tools sent without gift boxes will be in poly bags.  If you are giving these as a gift, the gift box is a MUST.  The pocket pouches are a great way to carry your tool with the bullet pen, and I personally prefer to carry it this way.  Minimal printing through your pants, and the wedge shape fits perfectly in the corner of your pocket to keep them from moving around.  The pouches are included at my cost.  This will be the cheapest they'll ever be offered for.  The pens are really a great EDC pen and carrying them in the pouch is a great way to not lose them.

        

     

        

     

    The ARti party:  This will be EPIC.  The exact schedule is flexible.  If you'd like to spend the whole time getting some legit training, we can do that.  I can arrange training for beginners to experienced shooters.   If you'd like to train some pistol, some CQB rifle, and learn to shoot 1000 yards, then go blow stuff up, and then go shoot rabbits in the desert from a moving UTV with a full-auto rifle, I'm pretty sure I can set that up.  You tell me what you'd like to do and I'll do my best to arrange it.  I'll provide travel, hotel stay, ammo, training, rides, some meals, weapons that will be used, and safety equipment.  Depending on what you want, there may be an additional charge for extreme stuff.  I can make it more of a one-on-one setting with instructors, or I can arrange more people to be there and we can run some competition style drills against eachothers' times.  We can work around your schedule.  It will be worth the $5k.  I'm making 3 of them available.  If you have a group of 6, snag all of them!  While this will be as explosively fun as possible, safety will always be the emphasis.
     

    What I need and why:

    I've already funded this first round of the ARti tool.  I can continue as-is with manufacturing and all will be fine, but I would love to be able to offer the ARti tool in a retail setting.  for that to happen, I'll need to reduce manufacturing costs by refining a few processes, purchasing materials in bulk, and invest in tooling for custom retail packaging.  This way I can offer retailers an attractive option while also (hopefully) lowering the end-user cost a little.  It will never be to where I'm offering it during this campaign, but can be a little lower than the current $44 MSRP.  
    I also have a lot more ideas for some really cool and unique EDC gear that I would love to bring to market.  Unfortunately, I don't have the funding to do them all, so I need the ARti tool to be a success for this also.  I have years of experience in product development and have a lot of great contacts to get stuff done.  I just need the funding now to refine this current project and then be able to move forward with the next.  This is my first try with Indiegogo or any crowdfunding, and I promise that on my future projects, my previous campaign backers will ALWAYS have first-go at the best pricing options at the beginning of my campaigns.  I love titanium and many of my future projects will be titanium gadgets.  And not just multitools....  At some point during the middle of this campaign I'll release some prototype photos and drawings of my next project.  So, back the project because the ARti tool is awesome and know that by doing so, you're also helping my next EDC innovations come to light.

       

       

         

         

        **The ARti tools pictured are prototypes.  The final versions will be only very slightly different.  Some of the unnecessary sharp edges will be slightly rounded-off, making it easier to handle without getting gouged.  The "titanium blasted finish" is shown on all of the photos below.

Pretty self-explanatory.  ARti tools sent without gift boxes will be in poly bags.  If you are giving these as a gift, the gift box is a MUST.  The pocket pouches are a great way to carry your tool with the bullet pen, and I personally prefer to carry it this way.  Minimal printing through your pants, and the wedge shape fits perfectly in the corner of your pocket to keep them from moving around.  The pouches are included at my cost.  This will be the cheapest they'll ever be offered for.  The pens are really a great EDC pen and carrying them in the pouch is a great way to not lose them.

    
 
    


 


The ARti party:  This will be EPIC.  The exact schedule is flexible.  If you'd like to spend the whole time getting some legit training, we can do that.  I can arrange training for beginners to experienced shooters.   If you'd like to train some pistol, some CQB rifle, and learn to shoot 1000 yards, then go blow stuff up, and then go shoot rabbits in the desert from a moving UTV with a full-auto rifle, I'm pretty sure I can set that up.  You tell me what you'd like to do and I'll do my best to arrange it.  I'll provide travel, hotel stay, ammo, training, rides, some meals, weapons that will be used, and safety equipment.  Depending on what you want, there may be an additional charge for extreme stuff.  I can make it more of a one-on-one setting with instructors, or I can arrange more people to be there and we can run some competition style drills against eachothers' times.  We can work around your schedule.  It will be worth the $5k.  I'm making 3 of them available.  If you have a group of 6, snag all of them!  While this will be as explosively fun as possible, safety will always be the emphasis.

 
What I need and why:I've already funded this first round of the ARti tool.  I can continue as-is with manufacturing and all will be fine, but I would love to be able to offer the ARti tool in a retail setting.  for that to happen, I'll need to reduce manufacturing costs by refining a few processes, purchasing materials in bulk, and invest in tooling for custom retail packaging.  This way I can offer retailers an attractive option while also (hopefully) lowering the end-user cost a little.  It will never be to where I'm offering it during this campaign, but can be a little lower than the current $44 MSRP.  I also have a lot more ideas for some really cool and unique EDC gear that I would love to bring to market.  Unfortunately, I don't have the funding to do them all, so I need the ARti tool to be a success for this also.  I have years of experience in product development and have a lot of great contacts to get stuff done.  I just need the funding now to refine this current project and then be able to move forward with the next.  This is my first try with Indiegogo or any crowdfunding, and I promise that on my future projects, my previous campaign backers will ALWAYS have first-go at the best pricing options at the beginning of my campaigns.  I love titanium and many of my future projects will be titanium gadgets.  And not just multitools....  At some point during the middle of this campaign I'll release some prototype photos and drawings of my next project.  So, back the project because the ARti tool is awesome and know that by doing so, you're also helping my next EDC innovations come to light.
 

 



 

 

**The ARti tools pictured are prototypes.  The final versions will be only very slightly different.  Some of the unnecessary sharp edges will be slightly rounded-off, making it easier to handle without getting gouged.  The "titanium blasted finish" is shown on all of the photos below.

story:
It seems every day that we turn on the news we learn of another mass shooting. Most of these incidents claim more lives than they should because no one in the area is carrying a weapon to stop a shooter. Over 20 million americans have a permit to legally carry a weapon, but sadly, less than 1% of those people carry on a daily basis. 

The reason people with CCW permits aren't carrying is because there is no easy convenient way to carry. The Ranger bag changes this. Just look at our patented "2-Second System."

 

With just a clip and a pull on the bag you are ready to defend yourself and everyone around you. 

Our patented 2-second system is available on 4 different bags all with different day-to-day functionality:

The “Quick Trip” bag is our most compact bag. It measures 7” in Width by 12” Tall by 2.5” Deep (from Front to Back). It is great for that late evening jog, movie night out, or quick run to the grocery store.  Like all of our bags, “Quick Trip” bag features our “Patented 2-Second System” which allows for quick, safe and easy access to your weapon should the need arise.

The Quick Trip holds all of your essentials: car keys, wallet, phone, almost any full size pistol and 1 extra magazine pouch. The clear vinyl pocket on the back is perfect for identification and concealed carry permit. Every YKK zipper is durable, lockable and allows for rugged and aggressive use.

Most incidents or mass shootings occur in every-day, public areas. If you and your “Quick Trip” bag are on the scene of one of these potentially fatal situations, rest assured, you will feel more secure.  

 

The “Ranger Bag” is our original and most popular bag design.  It measures 9.5” in Width by 13” Tall by 4.5” in Depth (Front to Back). The “Ranger Bag” has the ability to carry not only all of your essentials but it can hold most tablets, notebooks or notepads. With 4 sections, it has designated pockets for keys, pens, wallet, phone and much more. This bag comes with 1 extra magazine pouch. Every YKK zipper is durable, lockable and allows for rugged and aggressive use. 

Like all of our bags, “Ranger Bag” features our “Patented 2-Second System” which allows for quick, safe and easy access to your weapon should the need arise. The clear vinyl pocket on the back is perfect for identification and concealed carry permit.

 

 The “Scout Bag” aka FAT-BOY measures 10.5” in Width by 13” Tall and a whopping 8” in Depth (Front to Back). It fits any size iPad tablet or most other personal data devices.  With 3 main compartments and an extra compartments inside, it is big enough to carry your phone, wallet, keys, checkbook, books, Leatherman, water and almost anything else you need on a daily basis. 

And most importantly, it carries almost any size pistol and extra magazines. Every YKK zipper is durable, lockable and allows for rugged and aggressive use. The clear vinyl pocket on the back is perfect for identification and concealed carry permit. Our “Patented 2-Second System” gives its owner quick, safe and easy access to their weapon, should the need arise.

 

As the name implies, the “Executive Bag” is ready to execute and get business done. Looking like a common Messenger Bag, it’s our largest bag to date. Measuring 14.5” Tall by 12.5” Width by 7” Deep (Front to Back) it is perfect for notepads, binders, tablets of all sizes or your Laptop (up to 14”). Accommodating for personal items; keys, wallet, phone, camera, a book or two, and of course, any pistol (up to 12” total length) with 1 additional magazine. Every YKK zipper is durable, lockable and allows for rugged and aggressive use.  

The clear vinyl pocket on the back is perfect for identification and concealed carry permit. Like all of our bags, the “Executive Bag” has our “Patented 2-Second System” giving its owner quick, safe and easy access to their weapon should the need arise. Pick one up today and show everyone you know how business gets done.  

 

 

 

30 seconds of your time can make a huge difference in helping make America safe again. Take some time and click one of the links below to share the Ranger Bag with your friends and family. 

 

Risks & Challenges:

The biggest challenge we face is getting enough people on board to fund this project. The manufacturing is place, out team is ready to handle the orders, and we are ready to make America safe again!

 

Any Questions? Call Us:

1.888.RANGER9

(1.888.726.4379)

story:
Going on a 2-3 day trip?

What if you could pack it all PERFECTLY in under 60 seconds? See the magic for yourself:

Simply unzip to transform into a convenient hanging travel organizer that saves room.

Simply roll them and put in the pocket.

2 special pockets keep your shoes perfectly in place with covers that prevent scuffing.

Pack up to 5 shirts/T-shirts or 3 sweaters while keeping them perfectly folded.

Pack up to 6 underpants and 6 pairs of socks without them getting loose.

Keep your bathing and cosmetic items separate from your clothes in the breathable and zippable compartment.

Perfect for a laptop up to 15.6”. Includes a cord that lets you hook up a powerbank or use your computer as a charger.

Keep all your tech items safe and organized -- cords, chargers, action cameras and anything else! Includes special lock for your keys!

Store your pens and pencils with peace of mind knowing they won’t stain clothes.

Perfect for a bottle of water, thermos, flashlight or almost anything in one of these 3 pockets.

Need to keep valuables out of plain sight? Use one of the hidden pockets on the back to secure important items such as passports and travel documents.

And it still fits a little extra if you need it!

Did we mention there’s also a trolley bag?!

Hello dear backers,

This is Elizabeth again, back with a new project. I was shocked after my initial launch of the Magellan Vacuum Bags Project here on Kickstarter that amassed over 2000 backers and raised over $70000!

I just want to tell you all again how thankful I am!

After the Kickstarter campaign was ready, I had a lot of short travels with just my backpack, and I started to wonder if there was a more effective way to travel with just a backpack – a way to easily organize everything I needed, quickly and conveniently.

After some research on what people often take with them during small flights, I started to experiment with different forms of the backpack that would allow me to pack everything fast enough and organize properly. I wanted to go further than just Vacuum Bags - I wanted to give a solution that would use the backpack space to its’ maximum.

That’s what led me to my latest invention in partnership with BrandCharger Ltd. A better solution for short-trip travelers - The Magellan Archiver Backpack.

I think you’ll find it a huge help on your short trip travels, and I would really appreciate your support to launch my second project and make it a success once again.

With your support, you’ll be getting the Magellan's Archiver Backpack fresh off its first batch of mass production. Thank you so much!

story:
The best wallet mirror in history: Solid Ti6Al4V Grade 5 aerospace Titanium.

"Wow, is this really made of Titanium?!"

"This is the coolest wallet mirror I have ever seen!"

It's time to upgrade your wallet and claim your own solid aerospace-grade Titanium mirror.

Engineered from a single piece of solid Titanium. Polished by hand for hours to achieve a perfect mirror surface.

The perfect minimalist mirror for quick, discreet checks and touch-ups.

It is the exact dimensions of a standard credit card, making it portable and convenient.  Its clean, modern appearance brings your wallet to the next level.

No coatings or glass to break or chip off. This is a single piece of solid Titanium. The edges are smooth and safe.

Weighing only 18 grams (0.6oz), it is incredibly strong and lightweight! Titanium has the highest strength-to-density ratio of any element.

If you want the best of the best quality, most unique mirror in your wallet, pledge today to make the Solid Titanium Polar Mirror a reality!

story:
Información en ESPAÑOL: https://bit.ly/2xQTrtV

Practical

Travel as an expert! Shed the extra weight in your luggage. Forget about bulky laundry kits, as small as a credit card, WAYAKIT is the perfect travel companion.

 

Time-saver

 

Forget about expensive laundry services, hand-washing in the sink and tedious drying times while you travel. With WAYAKIT laundry spray, spend more time exploring.

 

All Natural

 

WAYAKIT laundry spray is safe biotechnology in a bottle that really works and travels with you. WAYAKIT is not a laundry refresher, it’s not a deodorant, and it’s not a toxic stain remover.

 

Wayakit is biotechnology in a bottle. It eliminates odors and stains in seconds.

For Stains, simply spray the cloth, tap the stain and rub away.

For Odors, spray once, and voila. Good as new!

Because in this new era of design thinking, customers are demanding more out of their products. We started WAYAKIT by doing more than 100 interviews to travelers from 23 different nationalities who all said they struggled with dirty laundry while traveling.

So we jumped into the lab to find a solution. Now, our next step is to create a strong relationship and build-up a community of WAYAKIT early adopters. We believe Indiegogo is the perfect platform for continuing this amazing journey!

 

We have built WAYAKIT prototype in Saudi Arabia and thanks to previous experience with our Mexican sister company in the cleaning industry, Sin Acqua, we figured out our supply chain.

We know exactly what it is required to get WAYAKIT to market, but we need the funds to start production: 1) new plastic injection molds and 2) high quality rubbing cloth is required. By ordering now, you are getting an exclusive, premium and personalized WAYAKIT ahead of everyone else.

We have spent years making WAYAKIT a reality, and now, you can play a part. Your contribution, no matter how big or small, will help us raise the funds we need to bring WAYAKIT to YOU!

We love traveling but are always frustrated by not being able to find travel-friendly laundry solutions. As innovators and environmentalists, we knew that we had to get to work! We spent the past year crafting a travel essential that fitted everyone’s lifestyle.

Today we are happy to share the world’s first compact, all-natural stain and odor removal spray. Wayakit links Environmental Sciences with real-world applications and we are so excited to be able to finally share this amazing travel essential with everyone!

Enjoy the journey with us and keep traveling!

WAYAK Girls

Wayakit: Instant, essential travel laundry spray

Description: Credit card sized REFILLABLE laundry spray for removing stains and stinky smells. The spray integrates a gentle cloth eraser for removing stains from even in the most delicate fabrics.

Volume: 20 ml | 0.67 fl oz (From 4 – 10 garments)

Size: 5.5 cm x 10.5 cm x 1.1 cm

Weight: 45 g

Non-toxic ingredients:

  • Natural surfactants with antibacterial properties
  • Organic solvents to remove grease from stains
  • Enzymes to break sweat molecules
  • Organic macromolecules that encapsulate volatile smells

 

 

Comments, questions & ideas? Just comment on the thread here or email us at contact@wayakit.com

story:
Dear friends if you are really rich not only money, but also soul, you need to pass to the same company with the fixed financing of https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/create-a-pro.... And in this company I don't know as to change type of financing and I ask to help me according to above to the specified link. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/create-a-pro...

Short summary

I wish to establish a professional team in the class yachts "Laser". Myself am a coach-in-class yachts. Success of my athletes are already high enough. My athletes are winners of the country in this class of yachts. For me it's important that my athletes have achieved great results at the international level in this sport.

What We Need & What You Get

I need money for the purchase of 5 yachts "Laser", the motorboat Brig F450S are necessary for me for providing athletes on water, and as transport for transportation of this equipment (the car + the trailer).  I from Russia, from the city of Yaroslavl.

For sponsors will place extremely favourably to the advertizing on yachts, sails, the boat and transport in view of popularity of this class of yachts in the world and, respectively, interest of public in the athlete and his sponsor. Each yacht on any part of arms including on a sail can bear advertizing. There is a lot of competitions and they are carried out in the different cities. And it simply beautifully and draws a lot of public attention. That you would see results of the advertizing company, I will send a photo from competitions and the detailed description to these photos.

If all sum doesn't gather, it is necessary to save, look for the supported yachts, the boat and transport.

The impact.

This project is valuable by several criteria. The main thing is the help to children in achievement of big heights in sports. The second is personal benefit of each investor during good and beautiful, and the most important of the productive advertizing company.

I myself 3 years ago due to injury retired from the sport and began training the children in such a short period of time my athletes have achieved good results and become winners and champions of the national championship.

Risks & Challenges

The aim of the project is the education of children, identifying them high athletic potential. On the way to this goal may have problems due to underfunding. This problem can be solved by successfully attracting sponsors because of already completed a successful advertising campaign, as well as personal savings.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not help financially, it would be great to see this project repost on your pages in Facebook are and twitter. And as you can to use the Indiegogo share tools

Thanks to your efforts of athletes will be able to achieve great results.

I would be very grateful if any, though not a significant contribution to this project.

And that's all there is to it.

Thank you for your SUPPORT.

story:
About Us

Mundara Platinum Travel, will offer a regional luxury, express style travel alternative with a level of comfort normally reserved for Business or First Class travel via todays airlines. Our price structure will compete directly with airline economy class, and undercut business and of course first class airline services while offering an equivalent level of service and luxury, not to mention other forms of road and rail travel. Our emphasis will be on smaller regional markets and their nearby major metropolitan neighbors, with the first two years focusing on Northern California, Oregon and Washington States.


While limited travel options and/or problematic airlines with multiple stopover or connections leave customers stranded in aircraft and/or in airport lounges for hours at a time, we offer a viable and safe alternative for Regional Travel and Getaway Packages throughout the Northwest region. With Mundara you will be able to reach those Metropolitan neighbors or visa versa, that in many cases are a mere few hours apart, by luxury road travel, refreshed and ready for your planned stay.

Initial services focusing on the San Francisco Bay Area to Rogue Valley of Southern Oregon (home of the world famous Shakespeare and the Brit Festivals) markets, and the leg from the same Rogue valley in Southern Oregon to Portland at the northern end of our state. Mundara Platinum Travel will be the premier source for luxury, feature packed travel in our chosen market. One trip on one of our mini coaches, experience the luxury, technology and concierge drop off and you will be a customer for life. 

Our service is a one of a kind, luxury service with full technology access for the ultimate in productivity and entertainment. Being a ground based express style service, we are not restricted by the pitfalls of airlines, and other ground based options (such as Greyhound), weather traumas such as heavy fog, storms and inbound aircraft delays.

What We Need & What You Get

We need between $30,000 and $50,000 to get things rolling, these funds will be in addition to the financing for the bulk of our first bus which is in progress. If we do not reach the full goal, we are well within our means of getting the business off the ground. However, being a start-up, of course, every dollar matters. We will also be raising funds through pre-sale of tickets up to 90 days in advance of vehicle delivery.

In appreciation, you have the option of receiving a custom T-Shirt to celebrate the launch of a soon to be great american business icon,

Travel mugs featuring our company, for use on your trips with us and more importantly, gift certificates and one way, or round trip tickets to and from the Rogue valley in Oregon or the San Francisco Bay area on our luxury coaches.

Lastly we offer for larger business supporters the opportunity to design your own day out featuring our luxury busses, whether its a trip to the Napa Valley, Yosemite or Crater Lake in Oregon. Up to 8 individuals can enjoy a luxury day out on us, we do the driving and your business or leisure group can sit back and enjoy.

All certificates and trips feature no use by dates and significant discounts on our published rates (subject as always to seat and coach availability).

The Impact

In addition to helping with the vehicle deposit, the funds we raise here will have their greatest effect on the amount of marketing we can achieve in the months prior to the delivery of our first vehicle. While we expect solid cash flow almost immediately the marketing efforts begin, the strength and breadth of our marketing campaign could be greatly enhanced based on a solid fundraising here on indiegogo.

This is a real and solid business plan, on sharing our vision with local bankers and businessmen, here in the Rogue Valley, as well as upper echelon management at the local Visitors and Convention Centre, we have received a 100% positive response. In fact, we already have people who want to start using our service as soon as we are ready to take bookings.

Our biggest concern is quite literally, will we be able to add a second bus quickly enough to meet expected demand and growth over a very short period of time after launch. Indications are we may need a second bus within 6 months of startup. If this becomes necessary, a strong response to this fund raising will put us in great shape for an early expansion. Needless to say under these circumstances we may be back to offer a second chance for you to get involved.

How are we different

How are we different? After all, there are multiple bus options right now, right? Yes and no! Your typical routes are relatively cheap and that is what you get; cheap, crowded uncomfortable busses with absolutely no emphasis on comfort and pleasure, let alone speed.  Most of the current alternatives (and all but an extremely limited number of direct flights), are not direct, requiring one or more stopovers at an intermediary hubs (such as Sacramento, Las Vegas, San Diego or Seattle), often for hours at a time, greatly extending your transit time and in the process detracting from the overall experience.

At Mundara Platinum Travel, our routes are designed with limited natural stopovers, direct services from center of demand to center of desire. A maximum of 8 (yes 8) passengers travelling in comfortable luxury. With our convenient pick up points and  "To Door" concierge drop off service within a convenient radius of the final destination. We provide a comfortable, stress free, safe travel experience, something you should expect in the 21st century.

Weather rarely has any effect on our schedules, as opposed to the constant chaos often experienced at your typical airport lounges. To make matters worse, your smaller regional airports are often unwitting participants and/or recipients of major traveller turmoil created at other centers around the country.

Let us put the experience and pleasure back into your travel. With Mundara Platinum Travel, the future of "Luxury" Travel is truly here at last.


Other Ways You Can Help

There are of course other ways you can help us. In addition to getting the word out there, passing on our details on this web site to your acquaintances, business associates, family or on Social Media, we would also be interested in;

* Drivers, as we expand we will need drivers for our busses, while this is 6 months or more away, we would be happy to receive resume's from interested individuals with a CDL in any of the western states.

* Watch our Website, coming online shortly, mundaratravel.com If you are planning to visit the Rogue Valley or visa versa, the San Francisco Bay Area, keep us in mind when developing your travel plans.

* We are looking for business partners whose services we can utilize, hotels in the Bay Area and Southern Oregon. Potential lunch or Dinner providers to be our standard stopovers in the Redding area of California, or Eugene in Oregon.

* Feel free to contribute to our program if you wish to support our endeavor, there are options for supporting us without utilizing the gift options listed above.

We are a new business, if you feel you have something we can offer, contact us, we are always open to new ideas.


Thank you all for your support.

Gary

Our price structure will compete directly with airline economy class, and undercut business and of course first class airline services while offering an equivalent level of service and luxury, not to mention other forms of road and rail travel. story:
Hello Contributors,

My name is Erica and I am a student at Concordia University. I am studying to get my degree in Emergency Management, under the Homeland Security program. I am passionate about community resiliency and the power of providing our communities with the tools needed to help us all fare well when disaster strikes.

My campaign is to create an app that will help develop community resiliency. It will have the ability to calculate how much supplies you and your family, including pet family, need within your designated number of survival days. It will have a calendar function that lets you know what to purchase each week to build up your resiliency supplies. Eventually I would like to add a GPS feature that will tell you where to find emergency supplies and help based on your location. Like where the closest hospital, pharmacy and grocery stores are to you.

This will help us and our communities become self-sufficient in an emergency situation. It is better to be prepared and not need it then to be not prepared and without support as we have seen all too often when natural disasters strike.

Here is the cost breakdown and why I need so much to get this app to be all it can be for you!

Blueprint: $10,000-$15,000

Design: $10,000

Development: (Ballparks)

- iPhone App: $15,000-$25,000

- Server/Backend: $5,000-$15,000

Ongoing (Hosting/Support) - $1,250/mo.

If I get more than I need I will work to have this app be created for an Android environment too! If I don’t get enough, then the funds will go toward the beginning stages of the iPhone app and I will try to find other funding sources.

Please share this fundraiser with all your family and friends! Help make it happen so that we can all have a tool to help us prepare for the unexpected.

story:
Mind Blown.

2014. After 15 months of production and working with people in the sustainability field such as environmentalist, Bill McKibben, professor of civil and environmental engineering at Stanford University, Mark Z. Jacobson, Eco-Philosopher, Joanna Macy and walking with 400 thousand people at The People's Climate March in NYC,  Brett knew he wanted to build an eco-friendly, sustainable village that people could come, unplug and have an immersive experience in a unique environment that takes participants out of their everyday box.   

Two years later, Brett linked up with award winning Architectural Firm Penda to create a design that blends Modern tech with Cultural Wisdom. CEO, Chris Precht, and his team came up with a unique one of a kind modular design based on Native American teepees built with bamboo, rope and recycled materials that allow the structure to become an element that eventually grows into the environment.  

Brett and his partner Kylie moved to Ecuador to build the dream. The team broke ground in December 2016 and are now in the last stages of completing this one of a kind structure.  It will have 5 bedrooms, sleep 6-12 comfortably and has a third-floor yoga studio with ocean views.  When Wild Child Village is complete, it will feature solar, water harvesting, a grey water system, compost toilets, organic gardens, a food forest and a beautiful yoga studio.

Brett and Kylie are now reaching out to like-minded individuals who believe in sustainable projects and paying it forward with this IndieGoGo campaign. The goal is to have everyone come and experience Wild Child Village for themselves.  As perks, the team has created some fun adventures and transformative retreats with some of their talented friends! 

What We Need:

$80,000

We are securing funds to finish building PHASE 1, pay for facilitators, retreats and basically book out Wild Child Village for the first year.

What It Will Cover:

- Community and private bathrooms $9,000

- Outdoor showers $1,000

- Large open kitchen/ dining area $10,000

-  2 single casitas and 1 dorm casita that sleeps 4 $20,000

- Solar array for the village $10,000

What You Get

Wild Child Village is a retreat center that will curate unique transformational experiences and fun adventures for purpose driven travelers who seek discovery, connectivity, and fulfillment through positive engagement with people, culture, and nature.

Perks include: 

  • Yoga and Wellness Retreats
  • A Sound Healing Retreat
  • Plant Medicine Retreat
  • Meditation Retreat
  • Breath Work Retreat
  • Surf Adventures
  • Week & Weekend Getaways
  • Exclusive clothing

Why Ecuador?

Ecuador is one of the most biodiverse countries in the world. The Andes, Amazon Rainforest, Highlands and the Galapagos Islands are four diverse and unique regions within the country, not to mention the surf is awesome too.  

Brett fell in love with the charming surf town of Ayampe four years ago while on a surf trip with his cousin. He has gone back every year since and is now making the dream of owning land and building a sustainable project a reality.

Wild Child Village is rooted on the edge of a rainforest in La Reserve Manabi, a 70-acre Eco-Community in the hills above Ayampe. With views of the ocean and mountains, the village is discretely tucked in the canyon for privacy, solitude, and room to grow.

Community Impact:

Ayampe is known for its conscious community, strong local comuna, and magical tranquility. Wild Child Village is building sustainable connections with the residents of the surrounding villages, recognizing that unity is a fundamental part of being ‘sustainable’. By fostering meaningful interaction between the local Ayampe community and WCV’s international community, WCV aims to:

- Co-create a sustainable and prosperous Ayampe, based on existing Ecuadorian values and societal characteristics

- Promote the best of Ecuador – its people, culture, the arts and local ingenuity

- Nurture a deeper understanding of our home in Ayampe through active participation in language, local rituals, cultural events, art, and music

- Promote unity and peace through mutual understanding, shared experiences and shared values

Giving Back:

Most children in Ayampe and neighboring areas have a basic level of education with no extracurricular activities or programs. Imagine all the potential and genius that could be revealed with a little inspiration and mentoring.  

WILD SPIRITS will be an After School Program (July - November) in association with the Waldorf schools that will open up new possibilities for the youth of Ayampe and help nurture hidden talents and passions through the creative arts, healing arts, sustainability, cooking, music, dance and leadership classes. With local and international teachers, students will have access to new creative outlets, new understandings and an open door to a new world view. Wild Child Village will be a campus which ignites the senses and the natural curiosity of its students. A place where innovation, creativity, and learning flourish. A community which has come together from all corners of the globe to share new experiences and knowledge.

Other Ways You Can Help

Instructors, teachers, artists, musicians and facilitators we need your help!  

The next two years will be heart opening, challenging and super fun! We will be accepting volunteers for work trade and are now taking resumes.

Send us an email explaining: 

- Who are you?

- What are your super powers, magic or skills?

- What are you passionate about?

- What's your dream?

- How can we co-create?

 

Follow the progression at: 

https://www.instagram.com/wildchildvillage/

https://www.facebook.com/WildChildVillage/

 

 

Our Exclusive Retreats! 

 

OWL Couples Detox Retreat  $2,000

Detox~~Healing Foods~Adventure~Daily Ritual Practices

Lead by, Lindsey Erin & Andre Bolourchi

January 20th-27th

Experience:

Join Lindsey Erin + Andre Bolourchi of OWL (One Whole Life) in Ayampe, Ecuador!January 13th-20th experience the magic of Wild Child Village and partake in a couples detox experience where Andre and Lindsey will guide you through a 7 day cleanse. Give your body the opportunity to heal and your mind the space to relax, while exploring the beauty of Ecuador. 

Throughout the week, you’ll learn new techniques to improve your health and relationships through integrating daily rituals, breath and movement practices, healthy meal planning, and conscious communication skills. There will be time for surfing, hiking, yoga, writing, and more, a sacred sweat lodge & cacao ceremony and freshly prepared, organic cleanse-friendly meals each day. 

Offerings:

  • 7 day/ 7 night stay in your bamboo haven
  • 7 day cleanse all meals included 
  • Daily meditation, breath work, and movement practices 
  • Healthy Daily Rituals Workshop
  • Cacao Ceremony 
  • Daily beach time
  • Surfing
  • Temescal Sweat Lodge 
  • Los Frailes- half day hike and relaxing beach excursion 
  • Access to jungle walks and hikes

 

Wild & Free Yoga Retreat $1,350

Yoga~Energy Foods~Play

Lead By, Maria Margolies

February 3rd-10th

Experience:

Mind-altering journey thru vibrational ritual, movement, breath and nourishing foods. In this magical setting, we will weave a practice of Yoga, meditation, nourishing plant foods, herbal delights, beauty and nutrition classes and centuries old traditions.

Offerings:

  • 7 day/ 7 night stay in your bamboo haven
  • All meals included
  • Daily Yoga
  • Daily Meditation
  • Breathwork
  • Herbal Classes
  • 5-Rhythms
  • Daily beach time
  • Surfing
  • Access to jungle walks and hikes

 

Bird Tribe Medicine Circle Retreat $1,500

Ceremony~Rejuvenating Foods~Play

Lead by, Tony Moss and Bird Tribe

March 3rd-10th

Experience:

A week of heart opening, soul expanding and healing ceremonies Lead by Tony Moss and Bird Tribe. “Bird Tribe” is an established "medicine circle" that brings together traditional and contemporary North and South ritual practices and music. Tony Moss is a trusted facilitator with over 20 years experience and a reputation for quality and integrity. The Bird Tribe ceremonies are renowned for the safety of the container held, their integrity, and for the beautiful live music - all offered in an open, safe, and nourishing space to do psycho/spiritual exploration with plant medicines. This retreat will serve anyone who wants to expand consciousness, heal trauma, depression, addictions, explore, play, rejuvenate and experience the beautiful micro climate of Ayampe, Ecuador!

Offerings:

  • 7 day/ 7 night stay in your bamboo haven
  • All meals included
  • 3 Ayahuasca Ceremonies
  • 1 Huachuma Ceremony
  • 1 Sweat Lodge
  • Day trip to hike Agua Blanca to experience mineral baths and archaeological sites
  • Surfing (optional)

 

QUANTUM HARMONIX Retreat $1,350

Sound Healing~Meditation~Nourishment~Play

Lead by, Torkom Ji

March 17th-24th

Experience:

Master Sound Healer and Sound Architect, Torkom Ji has curated a beautiful co-creative experience for you all! A week of dropping into his synthesizing-432Hz sound healing experiences and daily meditations. Opening the heart and explore with sacred traditional medicine ceremony. Rejuvenating and nourishing the body and soul with yummy plant-based foods, Mamma ocean healings, and adventures in the jungle!

Offerings:

  • 7 day/ 7 night stay in your bamboo haven
  • 3 nourishing plant-based meals a day + healthy snacks provided (7 days)
  • daily Quantum Harmonix sound transmissions
  • 2 daily silent meditations
  • daily beach and nature hikes
  • 1 Sweat Lodge
  • Secret beaches of Los Frailes
  • Ayampe Colibri Trail
  • Surfing (optional)

 

Ohm Owl Retreat $1,400

Yoga~Surfing~Healing~Connection

Lead by, Christine Fronterotta and Andrey Cespedes

March 31- April 7th

Experience:

Welcome to Light, Love, and Pura Vida! Reconnect back to your body, mind, and spirit! Remember what it means to feel your body in flow, and take yourself to new levels of sensational experiences. On this special retreat, you will surf, practice yoga, and receive sound and energy healings. Enjoy nourishing healing foods while experiencing deep connection to community and sustainable living.

Offerings:

  • 7 day/ 7 night stay in your bamboo haven
  • All meals included
  • Daily Yoga
  • Energy healings
  • Daily beach time
  • Surfing
  • Temescal sweat lodge 
  • Agua Blanca day adventure- hiking, mineral pool, archeological sites, a picnic, and yoga!
  • Access to jungle walks and hikes

 

Aries Spring Awakening Retreat $1,350

Yoga~Ceremony~Healing Foods~Soul Awakening 

Lead by, Julien Elizabeth 

April 14th-21st

Experience:

Take a step back from fast-paced living and reconnect with the natural world for a week in paradise. On this retreat, we will unplug and unwind into the creative and passionate energy of April’s Aries New Moon. Discover how the moon and stars impact your nervous system and what you can do to align with the stars and your path using yoga, meditation, breath work, Nidra, high vibe nutrition and plant medicine. Throughout our experience, we will practice daily yoga, meditation, yoga Nidra and breath work while enjoying the majestic surf, inspiring land and nourishing foods found only in Ayampe, Ecuador. 

Offerings:

  • 7 day/ 7 night stay in your bamboo haven
  • All meals included
  • Daily Guided Yoga Nidra
  • Daily Meditation 
  • Breath Work
  • Moon Mapping & Astrology Workshop
  • A New Moon Cacao Ceremony brings us into alignment with the sign of Aries, a time that invites passion, bravery, and creativity! 
  • Daily beach time
  • Surfing
  • Temescal Sweat Lodge 
  • Los Frailes- half day hike and relaxing beach excursion 
  • Access to jungle walks and hikes

 

*DISCLAIMER*

*After the campaign, you will receive an email with full details and instructions for each retreat*

*Second half of deposit for retreats is due 1 month before retreat date*

*All money from "RETREAT DEPOSITS" can only be refunded as accommodation credits* 

*Flights and airport transport not included in All-Inclusive packages or Retreats*

A community which has come together from all corners of the globe to share new experiences and knowledge.
Other Ways You Can Help

Instructors, teachers, artists, musicians and facilitators we need your help!  
The next two years will be heart opening, challenging and super fun! We will be accepting volunteers for work trade and are now taking resumes.
Send us an email explaining: 
- Who are you?
- What are your super powers, magic or skills?
- What are you passionate about?
- What's your dream?
- How can we co-create?

https://www.facebook.com/WildChildVillage/

story:
flak /flăk/ n.

1. the firing of guns from the ground at enemy aircraft, or the bullets, etc. that the guns fire:

2. harsh criticism; hostile reaction; abuse:

The Flak Sack seemed like an obvious name to us for a bag that can withstand whatever life throws at it. The Flak Sack by the LOCTOTE INDUSTRIAL BAG CO. is the toughest (if not the only) worry-free drawstring backpack ever. It was designed to accommodate the lifestyles of people on the go needing to have their essentials with them, but not able to be constantly looking after them. The bag is like a portable safe for your valuables. Simply lock the bag closed and to any secure object - and leave it without worrying about it being tampered with, damaged, or stolen.

                                        

LOCTOTE™ bags are crafted from a double-layer of the most advanced cut resistant fabric in the world. Woven from a blend of high molecular weight polyethylene (HMWPE) and other state-of-the-art fibers, the fabric was originally developed for use in high performance body armor and personal protection under-garments for law enforcement, corrections, and security workers. Our bags have the highest possible Blade Cut Resistance, Tear Resistance, and Abrasion Resistance ratings based on international (ISO) and European (EN) standards. Our bags are 5 times more cut resistant than Kevlar®, a material known for its use in bulletproof vests. 

Simply put, no fabric available today is absolutely 100% cut-proof. If it was, you wouldn't be able to make anything with it. Our bags are the most slash resistant you will find in the market, and it takes very specialized equipment to make them. To a thief, it's not worth the trouble. So how slash resistant is it? We shot a video with a shirt made out of our fabric to demonstrate that we don’t just say that we stand behind our claims, we literally stand behind them. We are confident that we have created for you The Most Extreme Drawstring Backpack in the World.

Pull it, lock it and leave it. It’s that simple. The secret is a patent-pending locking strap and heavy-duty solid brass and hardened steel lock that enable you to lock your bag shut, and to a fixed object. Tested to over 1,000 lbs on the Strapinator (basically, a medieval torture device for bags), the flexible cut and break resistant tubular nylon lock strap is reinforced and grommeted with custom stainless steel components and 49 strands of stainless steel wire, making it difficult to cut, break or tear without extreme force or heavy tools. This strap resides in a hidden channel constructed between the layers of the extreme cut resistant fabric, where it remains out of sight and out of they way until you need it. The lock itself also stores securely and out of the way behind the leather LOCTOTE logo patch.  Vegans, we're working on a non-leather version too.

 

 

As RFID radio transmission technology is becoming increasingly widespread in passports, credit cards, debit cards, identity cards, key cards, and access control cards, the risks of “electronic pick-pocketing” (identity and personal data theft, payment fraud, and unintentional contactless payment) are on the rise. Without shielding, unauthorized parties can read the data stored on these items with the aid of an RFID reader, from a distance without any direct physical contact. Each LOCTOTE™ bag comes with a large water resistant internal pocket lined with a patented FIPS 201* certified RFID blocking material which is approved by the US Government for effectively shielding all contactless credit cards, passports, drivers licenses, ISO 14443A/B and EPC Gen1/Gen2 contactless smart cards that operate at 13.56 Mhz and above (13.56 Mhz interface is the one that typically contains personal data).

*FIPS 201 certification indicates successful testing against a rigorous, comprehensive set of functional requirements derived from government-wide specifications.

 

 

 

 

Stuff happens! Rain, spills, splashes, puddles, high-tide, and general carelessness are the enemy of your small electronic devices and leather goods. We pre-treat each bag with an industrial grade stain and water repellant, so spills and splashes will simply bead and run off the fabric. Each LOCTOTE™ bag also comes equipped with a large (capable of holding an iPad Mini) water-resistant interior pocket crafted from urethane coated 200-denier nylon, heavy-duty coated-polyester thread, and a color-matched water-resistant zipper to keep your stuff safe & dry from the perils of an active lifestyle. 

 

 

You won’t believe it until you feel it… LOCTOTE™ bags are brutally durable yet unbelievably soft and supple. It’s no surprise, when you consider that they are constructed of a fabric originally developed to be worn against the skin. They are so soft that you can actually use them as a pillow, and to prove it, I stuffed one of our bags and had my youngest daughter sleep with it as her pillow every night for a week. She found our latex-free fabric to be soft, comfortable, non-abrasive, and non-irritating. Unfortunately, my wife cannot say the same thing about my approach for testing softness…

 

 

When you start with a blank sheet of paper you get to re-think everything. That’s what we did with this bag. We considered the best way and the best materials each step along the way. We purposefully over-engineered, over-designed, and over-built. Nothing was left to chance, and in the end we created a product that is functional, packed with features and built to last.

  • One-piece construction eliminates bottom seam blow-out
  • Oversized swivel trigger-snap key clip keeps your keys secure and handy llll
  • Leather LOCTOTE™ badge doubles as a pocket to conveniently store your lock or ID 
  • Heavy-duty UV resistant bonded polyester thread used throughout the bag ensures strength even after repeated use and prolonged exposure to the sun 
  • Custom-made double-braided nylon yacht rope is flexible, strong, and pleasant to the touch 
  • Customizable 3-digit lock combination
  • Lock-stitched drawstring ropes always stay even and balanced

 

We started from the ground up. We were inspired by the functional simplicity of Mid-Century Minimalism, the freedom of thought and disregard for existing rules of Abstract Expressionism, and the innovation, strength, and enduring quality of Vintage Heavy Industry.  

 

 

We thought through everything and skimped on nothing. We did things to test our bags that didn’t make our moms proud (and possibly violated a few city ordinances). Good enough wasn’t good enough. We saw beauty in strength and elegance in simplicity. We got in touch with our softer side, and we kept innovating until we got it right. At the end of it all, we created a product that we think will blow your mind.

 

We are a small employee-owned company located in the heartland of America. We still believe in the American dream and the values that industrialized our nation and made it great — quality and craftsmanship forged from the sweat and labor of strong dedicated workers who take pride in their trade while creating innovative products that improve lives. We scour the globe to find the absolute best and most technologically advanced materials and manufacturers available. We compromise on nothing when it comes to quality and authenticity, and cut no corners in crafting goods built to outlive their owners. There’s nothing fancy and no secret formula to what we do. We’re just hands-on hard-working folks providing customers handcrafted hard-wearing products at a fair price. It’s really quite simple.

 

 

The idea behind LOCTOTE came as a result of a family vacation in St. Croix. My wife and kids had all gone back to the room for the day, and I decided to stay out on the beach and do some snorkeling. Before heading out into the water, I put my phone, earbuds, and cash in my shoe, which I covered with a towel and left on a beach chair. I swam out about 100 yards, and when I looked back to shore, I saw an individual shuffling through my stuff on the beach, and then walk away with something in his hand. I yelled to him, and swam back to shore as fast as I could, but by the time I got there, both he and my stuff were gone. This was a real downer for the vacation, and I decided that I needed a solution to prevent something like this from ever happening again.

 

 

When I got back to the states, I began my search for a solution to the problem. To me, the problem was more complex than just a way to prevent my personal items from being stolen when I was at the beach. I had a whole list of requirements for this product I was seeking. First and foremost, I wanted a way carry my personal items that would enable me to securely fasten them to a stationary object so they couldn’t be tampered with or stolen. In my mind, this would require a locking mechanism that couldn’t be broken, cut, or torn, and the container itself also needed to be made of something that was resistant to cutting or tearing. I basically wanted a product that would be impenetrable to thieves of all kinds, including protecting my credit cards and passports that contained RFID chips from unauthorized scanning (digital pick-pocketing). Conversely, I wanted something stylish, attractive, and functional — something that would seamlessly fit into my everyday life, that I would enjoy using and be proud to be seen using. More and more, this was sounding to me like some kind of a bag. 

That’s what I needed — an everyday “go to” bag that would meet all my technical requirements, and still be soft, foldable/packable, comfortable, highly functional, attractive and fashionable, and durable — and one that would clear my ultimate hurdle -- being able to get my wife to carry it. That shouldn’t be hard to find, I thought. Well, it was. In fact there was no product on the market that was even remotely close to what I was looking for. After exhausting my search, I began the process of creating the bag I was seeking. It took hundreds of hours of research, and countless prototypes and failed attempts. In the end, we have created a product that will blow your mind. Bags that are soft and beautiful, packed with features, and insanely durable. Some people say that our products are overkill, and that we must be over-compensating for something. Maybe. 

-Don Halpern

 

We're Don and Adam. No special roles or fancy titles here. In a company this small we all do everything from the highest level strategy and media planning, to cleaning up poop from Gizmo the 3lb micro-dog. 

Don is a recovering Management Consultant. With over 27 years experience helping companies become more operationally efficient, building and selling several firms, and traveling several million miles along the way, he has the skills, experience, work ethic and judgement necessary to make a business succeed. 

Adam is a recent grad from The Ohio State University Fisher School of Business.  With a focus on marketing, unlimited drive, and a thirst for learning and everything social, he provides fresh ideas, creative insight, and the skills to deliver it.

Most importantly, we both personally take 100% responsibility for ensuring that our backers' products are fulfilled and their expectations are exceeded.

 

                                       

A big thank you for checking out our product and for your help in making it a reality. Even if you can't support us with a pledge, contribute to our project by spreading the word on social media. Like, Follow, or Tweet us! 

 DOWNLOAD OUR MEDIA KIT BELOW:
story_txt:
Our Indiegogo Campaign is over. Thank you so much for all of your support. We are continuing to manufacture bags in the USA to ship to our Backers. We will sell no USA-made bags until all of our Kickstarter and Indiegogo Backers have received their bags. We now have overseas factories to assist with new orders. These products can be purchased through our website by clicking on the button below.  Stay safe and kindest regards,  Don & Adam

 


 
Some thieves stole our work and created a very inferior knock-off of LOCTOTE based on what they could learn from our website and crowdfunding campaigns. They cut corners, used inferior components, and they missed or ignored many of the critical design and construction details. Their product will not hold-up or perform like a true LOCTOTE. Assuming they ever ship product (not sure they will), their product will greatly disappoint customers, so time will sort them out. Support the original LOCTOTE and help these thieves to perish. 
 This is the bag that everybody, at some point in their life, wishes they had. Sometimes you just need a safe place to put your personal items and valuables while you carry them or do something else. Our purpose for creating this bag really is that simple. This product lets you live more and worry less. 
 We invite you to spend some time reading our story. We are passionate about our product, and we use these bags everyday. They work, and they do make our lives better. Please join us. Nothing makes us happier than seeing something we created benefitting the lives of others.  
WHAT OUR BACKERS ARE SAYING...
